GK16jgrasg1u:9: pāṣāṇād api pīyūṣaṃ syandate yasya līlayā/
GK16jgrasg1u:17: tathāpi kleśo me katham api gatārtho na bhavitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:18: timīndrāḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ vidadhatu payodheḥ punar ime
GK16jgrasg1u:21: kāvyaṃ mayātra nihitaṃ na parasya kiṃcit/
GK16jgrasg1u:27: kiṃ ca kulāni kavīnāṃ nisargasamyañci rañjayatu//
GK16jgrasg1u:28_1: kavisahṛdayayor āvaśyakatayā guṇālaṃkārādibhir nirūpaṇīye tasmin viśeṣyatāvacchedakaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:28_2: taditarabhedabuddhau sādhanaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ tāvan nirūpyate--
GK16jgrasg1u:30_0: ramaṇīyatā ca lokottarāhlādajanakajñānagocaratā / lokottaratvaṃ cāhlādagataś camatkāratvāparaparyāyo
GK16jgrasg1u:30_1: 'nubhavasākṣiko jātiviśeṣaḥ / kāraṇāṃ ca tadavacchinne bhāvanāviśeṣaḥ punaḥpunar
GK16jgrasg1u:31: ” “dhanaṃ te dāsyāmi” iti vākyārthadhījanyasyāhlādasya na lokottaratvam/ ato na tasmin vākye kāvyatvaprasaktiḥ/ itthaṃ ca camatkārajanakabhāvanāviṣayārthapratipādakaśabdatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:33: svaviśiṣṭajanakatāvacchedakārthapratipādakatāsaṃsargeṇā camatkāratvavattvam eva vā kāvyatvam iti phalitam/ yat tu prāñcaḥ “adoṣau saguṇau sālaṃkārau śabdārthau kāvyam” ity āhuḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:38: ityādiviśvajanīnavyavahārataḥ pratyuta śabdaviśeṣasyaiva kāvyapadārthatvapratipatteś ca/ vyavahāraḥ śabdamātre lakṣaṇayopapādanīya iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:40_0: yadi kāvyapadārthatayā parābhimate śabdārthayugale kāvyaśabdaśakteḥ pramāpakaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:40_1: kim api pramāṇāṃ syāt / tad eva tu na paśyāmaḥ / vimatavākyaṃ tv aśraddheyam eva /
GK16jgrasg1u:41_0: prāg uktād vyavahārataḥ śabdaviśeṣe siddhyantīṃ śaktiṃ ko nāma nivārayitum īṣṭe /
GK16jgrasg1u:41_1: etena vinigamanābhāvād ubhayatra śaktir iti pratyuktam / tadevaṃ śabdaviśeṣasyaiva
GK16jgrasg1u:41_2: kāvyapadārthatve siddhe tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam,
GK16jgrasg1u:42_0: na tu svakalpitasya kāvyapadārthasya / eṣaiva ca vedapurāṇādilakṣaṇeṣv api gatiḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:42_1: anyathā tatrāpīyaṃ duravasthā syāt / yat tv āsvādodbodhakatvam eva kāvyatvaprayojakaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:42_2: tacca śabde cārthe cāviśiṣṭam ity āhuḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:43_0: tan na / rāgasyāpi rasavyañjakatāyā dhvanikārādisakalālaṃkārikasaṃmatatvena prakṛte
GK16jgrasg1u:43_1: lakṣaṇīyatvāpatteḥ / kiṃ bahunā nāṭyāṅgānāṃ sarveṣām api prāyaśas tathātvena tatvāpāttir
GK16jgrasg1u:43_2: durvāraiva / etena rasodbodhasamarthasyaivātra lakṣyatvam ity api parāstam / api
GK16jgrasg1u:45_0: pratyekaparyāptaṃ vā / nādyaḥ / eko na dvāv iti vyavahārasyeva ślokavākyaṃ na kāvyam
GK16jgrasg1u:45_1: iti vyavahārasyāpatteḥ / na dvitīyaḥ / ekasmin padye kāvyadvayavyavahārāpatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:46_0: lakṣaṇe guṇālaṅkārādiniveśo 'pi na yuktaḥ / “uditaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vidhoḥ” iti kāvye dūtyabhisārikāvirahiṇyādisamudīrite
GK16jgrasg1u:46_2: na cedam akāvyam iti śakyaṃ vaditum / kāvyatayā parābhimatasyāpi yathā vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:46_3: kāvyajīvitaṃ camatkāritvaṃ cāviśiṣṭam eva / guṇatvālaṅkāratvāder ananugamāc ca /
GK16jgrasg1u:46_4: duṣṭa kāvyam iti vyavahārasya bādhakaṃ vinā lākṣaṇikatvāyogāc ca / na ca saṃyogābhāvavān
GK16jgrasg1u:46_5: vṛkṣaḥ saṃyogītivad aṃśabhedena / doṣarahitaṃ duṣṭam iti vyavahāre bādhakaṃ nāstīti
GK16jgrasg1u:47_0: na śākhāyām” iti pratīter ivedaṃ padyaṃ pūrvārdhe kāvyam uttarārdhe tu na kāvyam
GK16jgrasg1u:47_1: iti svarasavāhino viśvajanīnānubhavasya virahād avyāpyavṛttitāyā api tasyāyogāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:48: hārādivad upaskārakāṇām alaṃkārāṇāṃ ca śarīraghaṭakatvānupapatteś ca/ yat tu “rasavad eva kāvyam” iti sāhityadarpaṇe nirṇītam,
GK16jgrasg1u:49: tan na/ vastvalaṃkārapradhānānāṃ kāvyānām akāvyatvāpatteḥ/ na ceṣṭāpattiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:50_1: kavibhir varṇitāni kapibālādivilasitāni ca / na ca tatrāpi yathākathaṃcit paramparayā
GK16jgrasg1u:51_1: iti dik / tasya ca kāraṇaṃ kavigatā kevalā pratibhā / sā ca kāvyaghaṭanānukūlaśabdārthopasthitiḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:51_2: tadgataṃ ca pratibhātvaṃ kāvyakāraṇatāvacchedakatayā siddho jātiviśeṣa upādhirūpaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:52_0: vākhaṇḍam / tasyāś ca hetuḥ kvacid devatāmahāpuruṣaprasādādijanyam adṛṣṭam / kvacic
GK16jgrasg1u:52_1: ca vilakṣaṇavyutpattikāvyakaraṇābhyāsau / na tu trayam eva / bālādes tau vināpi kevalān
GK16jgrasg1u:52_2: mahāpuruṣaprasādād api pratibhotpatteḥ / na tatra tayor janmāntarīyayoḥ kalpanaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:52_3: vācyam / gauravān mānābhāvāt kāryasyānyathāpy upapatteś ca / loke hi balavatā pramāṇenāgamādinā
GK16jgrasg1u:52_4: sati kāraṇātānirṇāye paścād upasthitasya vyabhicārasya vāraṇāya janmāntarīyam anyathānupapattyā
GK16jgrasg1u:52_5: kāraṇaṃ dharmādharmādi kalpyate / anyathā tu vyabhicāropasthityā pūrvavṛttakāraṇatānirṇāye
GK16jgrasg1u:52_6: bhramatvapratipattir eva jāyate / nāpi kevalam adṛṣṭam eva kāraṇam ity api śakyaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:52_7: vaditum / kiyantaṃcit kālaṃ kāvyaṃ kartum aśaknuvataḥ katham api saṃjātayor vyutpattyabhyāsayoḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:52_8: pratibhāyāḥ prādurbhāvasya darśanāt / tatrāpy adṛṣṭasyāṅgīkāre prāg api tābhyāṃ tasyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:52_9: prasakteḥ / na ca tatra pratibhāyāḥ pratibandhakam adṛṣṭāntaraṃ kalpyam iti vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:52_11: lāghavāt / ataḥ prāguktasaraṇir eva jyāyasī / tādṛśādṛṣṭasya tādṛśavyutpattyabhyāsayoś
GK16jgrasg1u:53: ato na vyabhicāraḥ/ pratibhātvaṃ ca kavitāyāḥ kāraṇātāvacchedakaṃ,
GK16jgrasg1u:54_0: pratibhāgatavailakṣaṇyam eva vā vilakṣaṇakāvyaṃ pratīti nātrāpi saḥ / na ca sator
GK16jgrasg1u:54_1: api vyutpatyabhyāsayor yatra na pratibhotpattis tatrānvayavyabhicāra iti vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:54_2: tatra tayos tādṛśavailakṣaṇye mānābhāvena kāraṇatāvacchedakānavacchinnatvāt / pāpaviśeṣasya
GK16jgrasg1u:54_3: tatra pratibandhakatvakalpanād vā na doṣaḥ / pratibandhakābhāvasya ca kāraṇatā samuditaśaktyāditrayahetutāvādinaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:54_4: śaktimātrahetutāvādinaś cāviśiṣṭā / prativādinā mantrādibhiḥ kṛte katipayadivasavyāpini
GK16jgrasg1u:56: śabdārthau yatra guṇībhāvitātmānau kamapyartham abhivyaṅktas tad ādyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:57_1: camatkāritayā tadvāraṇāya guṇībhāvitātmānāv iti svāpekṣayā vyaṅgyaprādhānyābhiprāyakam /
GK16jgrasg1u:65_0: saṃyogād ratir abhivyajyate / ālambanādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyate / na ca yady ayaṃ śayitaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:65_1: syāt tadāsyānanāmbujaṃ cumbeyam iti nāyikecchāyā eva vyaṅgayatvam atreti vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:65_2: manorathān saphalīkartum asamarthetyanena manorathāḥ sarve 'syā hṛdi tiṣṭanti iti
GK16jgrasg1u:65_3: pratīteḥ svaśabdena manorathapadena sāmānyākāreṇa tādṛśecchāyā api nivedanāt / na
GK16jgrasg1u:65_4: ca manorathapadena manorathatvākāreṇā sāmānyecchāyā abhidhāne 'pi cumbeyam iti viṣayaviśeṣaviśiṣṭecchātvena
GK16jgrasg1u:65_5: vyaṅgyatve kiṃ bādhakam iti vācyam / camatkāro na syād ityasyaiva bādhakatvāt / na
GK16jgrasg1u:65_6: hi viśeṣākāreṇa vyaṅgyo 'pi sāmānyākāreṇābhihito 'rthaḥ sahṛdayānāṃ camatkṛtim utpādayitum
GK16jgrasg1u:65_7: īṣṭe / katham api vācyavṛttyanāliṅgitasyaiva vyaṅgyasya camatkāritvenālaṃkārikaiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:65_8: svīkārāt / cumbanecchāyā ratyanubhāvatayaiva sundaratvena tadavyañjane cumbāmīti
GK16jgrasg1u:65_9: śabdabalāc cumbanecchāvad acamatkāritvāc ca / evaṃ trapāyā api na prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvam /
GK16jgrasg1u:65_10: anuvādyatāvacchedakatayā pratītāyāṃ tasyāṃ mukhyavākyārthatvāyogāt / na ca daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:65_11: vidheyam iti nānuvādyatāvacchedakatvaṃ tasyā iti vācyam / evam api nayanagatadaramīlanasya
GK16jgrasg1u:66: vācyavṛttyā rater anubhāve nirīkṣaṇo trapāyā anubhāvasya daramīlanasyeva vyañjanayā tasyāṃ tasyā api guṇībhāvapratyayaucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:68: gurumadhyagatā mayā natāṅgī nihatā nīrajakorakeṇa mandam/
GK16jgrasg1u:70: atra ghūrṇitāsīd ityanenāsamīkṣyakārin kimidam anucitaṃ kṛtavān asīty arthasamvalito 'marṣaś carvaṇāviśrāntidhāmatvāt prādhānyena vyajyate/ tatra śabdo 'rthaś ca guṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:72: “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ śvāsāsaṅga na yā sehe/
GK16jgrasg1u:73: samprati sā hṛdayagataṃ priyapāṇiṃ mandam ākṣipati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:74_0: idaṃ ca padyaṃ mannirmitaprabandhagatatvena pūrvasākāṅkṣam iti diṅmātreṇa vyākhyāyate
GK16jgrasg1u:74_1: --- yā navavadhūḥ palyaṅkaśayitā śvāsasyāsaṅgamātreṇāpi saṃkucad aṅgalatikābhūt sā
GK16jgrasg1u:74_2: samprati prasthānapūrvarajanyāṃ pravatsyatpatikā priyeṇa saśaṅkena samarpitaṃ hṛdi

GK16jgrasg1u:75_1: saṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyate / upapādayiṣyate ca sthāyyādīnām api saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgayatvam /
GK16jgrasg1u:75_2: amum eva ca prabhedaṃ dhvanim āmananti /
GK16jgrasg1u:76_0: yat tu citramīmāṃsāyām appayyadīkṣitaiḥ “niḥśeṣacyutacandanam” iti padyaṃ dhvanyudāharaṇaprasaṅge
GK16jgrasg1u:77: snāne hi sarvatra candana cyutiḥ syāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:78_0: tava tu stanayos taṭa upari bhāga eva dṛśyate / iyam āśleṣakṛtaiva / tathā nirmṛṣṭarāgo
GK16jgrasg1u:78_1: 'dhara ity atra tāmbūlagrahaṇavilambāt prācīnarāgasya kiṃcin mṛṣṭatety anyathāsiddhiparihārāya

GK16jgrasg1u:78_3: iti viśiṣya grahaṇam / uttaroṣṭhe sarāge 'dharoṣṭhamātrasya nirmṛṣṭarāgatā cumbanakṛtaiva ityādinā,
GK16jgrasg1u:79_0: “idam api dhvaner udāharaṇam” ityantena sandarbheṇa / “taṭādighaṭitā vākyārthāḥ snānavyāvṛttidvārā
GK16jgrasg1u:79_1: saṃbhogāṅgānām āśleṣacumbanādīnāṃ pratipādanena pradhānavyaṅgyavyañjane sāhāyakam ācaranti iti,
GK16jgrasg1u:80_1: upapattivirodhāc ca / tathā hi-- pañcamollāsaśeṣe “niḥśeṣetyādau gamakatayā yāni
GK16jgrasg1u:80_2: candanacyavanādīny upāttāni tāni kāraṇāntarato 'pi bhavanti / yataś cātraiva snānakāryatvenopāttānīti
GK16jgrasg1u:80_3: nopabhoga eva pratibaddhānīty anaikāntikāni iti kāvyaprakāśakṛtoktam / tathā tatraiva tena--

GK16jgrasg1u:83_0: ityādau liṅgajaliṅgijñānarūpeṇānumānena vyaktiṃ gatārthayato vyaktivivekakṛto mataṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:83_1: pratyācakṣāṇena vyabhicāritvenāsiddhatvena ca saṃdihyamānād api liṅgād vyañjanam
GK16jgrasg1u:83_2: abhyupagatam / ittham eva ca dhvanikṛtāpi prathamoddyote / evaṃ ca vyañjakānāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:83_3: pratipādayatāṃ prāmāṇikānāṃ granthaiḥ sahāsādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatas tava granthasya
GK16jgrasg1u:83_4: virodhaḥ sphuṭaḥ / kiṃ ca yad idaṃ niḥśeṣetyādyavāntaravākyārthānāṃ vāpīsnānavyāvṛttidvāreṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:83_5: vyaṅgyāsādhāraṇyaṃ saṃpādyate tat kim artham iti pṛcchāmaḥ / vyaṅgyasya vyañjanārtham
GK16jgrasg1u:85: maha mandabhāiṇīe keraṃ sahi tuha paribhavai//“
GK16jgrasg1u:86_2: ca / atha taṭādighaṭitatve 'pi na niḥśeṣetyādivākyārthānām asādhāraṇyam / salilārdravasanakaraṇakaproñchanādināpi
GK16jgrasg1u:86_3: tatsambhavād iti cet tarhi vāpīsnānavyāvartanena kaḥ puruṣārthaḥ / ekatrānaikāntikatvasyeva
GK16jgrasg1u:86_4: bahuṣv anaikāntikatāyā api jñātāyā anumitipratikūlatvād vyaktyapratikūlatvāc ca /
GK16jgrasg1u:86_5: api cātra hi tadantikam eva rantuṃ gatāsīti vyaṅgyaśarīre tadantikagamanaṃ ramaṇarūpaphalāṃśaś
GK16jgrasg1u:86_6: ceti dvayaṃ ghaṭakam / tatra tāvat tadantikaṃ gatāsītyaṃśasya tvanmate vyaṅgyatvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:86_9: gatā na gateti śabdābhyāṃ virodhilakṣaṇayā niṣedhasya vidheś ca pratīter upapatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:86_10: na hi mukhyārthabādhenonmīlite 'rthe vyaktivedyatocitā / yathā “aho pūrṇaṃ saro yatra
GK16jgrasg1u:86_11: luṭhantaḥ snānti mānavāḥ” ityatra kartṛviśeṣaṇānupapattyadhīnollāse pūrṇatvābhāve /

GK16jgrasg1u:88_0: “adhamatvam aprakṛṣṭatvaṃ tac ca jātyā karmaṇā vā bhavati / tatra jātyāpakarṣaṃ nottamanāyikā
GK16jgrasg1u:88_1: nāyakasya vākti” ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa bhavataivārthāpattivedyatāyāḥ sphuṭaṃ vacanāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:88_2: anyalabhyasyaca śabdārthatāyā asvīkṛteḥ / anyac ca yathā kathaṃcid aṅgīkuru vātra
GK16jgrasg1u:89_2: 'pi sphuṭatara eva / tasmād vācyārthasādhāraṇyam evocitam atividagdhanāyikānirūpitānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:89_3: viśeṣaṇavākyārthānām / tathā hi-- ayi bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame svārthaparāyaṇe
GK16jgrasg1u:89_4: snānakālātikramabhayavaśena nadīmadīyapriyayor antikam agatvaiva vāpīṃ snātum ito mamāntikād gatāsi,
GK16jgrasg1u:90: na punas tasya paravedanānabhijñatayā duḥkhadātṛtvenādhamasyāntikam/ yato niḥśeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanayos taṭam eva noraḥsthalam,
GK16jgrasg1u:91_1: taṭasyaivonnatatayā muhur āmarṣāt / evaṃ tvarayā samyag akṣālanenottaroṣṭho na nirmṛṣṭarāgo
GK16jgrasg1u:91_3: tathā / kiṃ ca samyag akṣālanena netre jalamātrasaṃsagad dūram uparibhāga evānañjane /
GK16jgrasg1u:91_4: śītavaśāt tānavāc ca tava tanuḥ pulakiteti / evaṃ tasyā vidagdhāyā gūḍhatātparyaivoktir ucitā,

GK16jgrasg1u:92_1: tātparyārthasya jhaṭity anākalanāt kuto 'tra lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ / anantaraṃ ca vācyārthapratipatter
GK16jgrasg1u:92_2: vaktṛboddhavyanāyakādīnāṃ vaiśiṣṭyasya pratītau satyām adhamapadena svapravṛttiprayojako
GK16jgrasg1u:92_5: ālaṃkārikasiddhāntaniṣkarṣaḥ / etena “adhamatvam apakṛṣṭatvaṃ tac ca jātyā karmaṇā

GK16jgrasg1u:254: ayaṃ ca paravināśādihetuḥ/ kṣudrāparādhajanmā tu paruṣavacanāsaṃbhāṣaṇādihetuḥ/ ayam evāmarṣākhyo vyabhicārīti vivekaḥ/

GK16jgrasg1u:384: “pariharatu dharāṃ phaṇipravīraḥ sukhamayatāṃ kamaṭho 'pi tāṃ vihāya/“
GK16jgrasg1u:385: aham iha puruhūta pakṣakoṇe nikhilam idaṃ jagad aklamaṃ vahāmi//
GK16jgrasg1u:386_0: puruhūtaṃ pratyeṣā garutmata uktiḥ / nanu “api vakti-“pariharatu dharām-” iti padyadvaye
GK16jgrasg1u:386_1: garva eva notsāhaḥ / madhyasthapadye tu dhṛtir eva dhvanyate iti bhāvadhvanaya evaite
GK16jgrasg1u:386_2: na rasadhvanaya iti cet tarhi yuddhavīrādiṣv api garvādidhvanitām eva kiṃ na brūyāḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:386_3: rasadhvanisāmānyam eva vā kiṃ na tadvyabhicāradhvananena gatārthayeḥ / sthāyipratītir
GK16jgrasg1u:386_4: durapahnavā cet tulyaṃ prakṛte 'pi / anantaroktapadye tu notsāhaḥ pratīyate / dayāvīrādiṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:390: kadācid bhagavato vāsudevasya vadanam ālokitavatyā yaśodāyā iyam uktiḥ/ atra vadanam ālambanam/ antargatacarācarajagajjāladarśanam uddīpanam/ hṛtacetanatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:391: tena gamyaṃ romāñcanetrasphāraṇādi cānubhāvaḥ/ trāsādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ/ naivātra vidyamānāpi putragatā prītiḥ pratīyate/ vyañjakābhāvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:392_0: pratītāyāṃ vā tasyāṃ vismayasya guṇatvaṃ na yujyate / evaṃ kaścin mahāpuruṣo 'yam
GK16jgrasg1u:392_1: iti bhaktir api tasyāḥ mamāyaṃ bāla iti niścayena pratibandhād utpattam eva neṣṭe /
GK16jgrasg1u:392_2: atas tasyām api vismayasya guṇībhāvo na śaṅkyaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:395: “citraṃ mahān eṣa navāvatāraḥ, kva kāntir eṣābhinavaiva bhaṅgiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:396: lokottaraṃ dhairyam aho prabhāvaḥ kāpy ākṛtir nūtana eṣa sargaḥ// iti,
GK16jgrasg1u:397_0: tatredaṃ vaktavyam-- pratīyatāṃ nāmātra vismayaḥ paraṃ tv asau kathaṃkāraṃ adbhutarasa]
GK16jgrasg1u:397_2: prakarṣakatvenāsya guṇībhūtatvāt / yathā mahābhārate gītāsu viśvarūpaṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:397_3: pārthasya “paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān” ity ādau
GK16jgrasg1u:397_4: vākyasaṃdarbhe / itthaṃ cāsya rasālaṃkāratvam ucitam / bhaktir naivātra pratīyata
GK16jgrasg1u:400: aṅgaṃ gavāṃ pūrvam aho pavitraṃ na vā kathaṃ rāsabhadharmapatnyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:401: tārkikaputro 'trālambanam/ tadīyā niḥśaṅkoktir uddīpikā/ radanaprakāśādir udvegādayaś cānubhāvavyabhicāriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:407: uttamānāṃ madhyamānāṃ nīcānām apy asau bhavet/
GK16jgrasg1u:408: tryavasthaḥ kathitas tasya ṣaḍbhedāḥ santi cāpare//
GK16jgrasg1u:409: smitaṃ ca hasitaṃ proktam uttame puruṣe budhaiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:417: ākuñcitākṣi mandraṃ ca vidur vihasitaṃ budhāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:426: kampamānatanur ākulekṣaṇāḥ spandituṃ na hi śaśāka lāvakaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:427: atra śyena ālambanam/ savegāpatanam uddīpanam/ ānanaśoṣādayo 'nubhāvāḥ/ dainyādayaḥ saṃcāriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:431: śavā ihālambanam/ antravidāraṇādy uddīpanam/ ākṣiptā romāñcanetranimīlanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ/ āvegādayaḥ saṃcāriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:432_1: saṃpratyayaḥ na tathā hāse jugupsāyāṃ ca / tatrālambanasyaiva pratīteḥ / padyaśrotuś
GK16jgrasg1u:432_2: ca rasāsvādādhikaraṇatvena laukikahāsajugupsāśrayatvānupapatter iti cet / satyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:432_3: tadāśrayasya draṣṭṛpuruṣaviśeṣasya tatrākṣepyatvāt / tadanākṣepe tu śrotuḥ svīyakāntāvarṇanapadyād
GK16jgrasg1u:433_0: evaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā rasāḥ / eṣāṃ prādhānye dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam guṇībhāve
GK16jgrasg1u:433_1: tu rasālaṃkāratvam / kecit tu “prādhānya evaiṣāṃ rasatvam anyathālaṃkāratvam eva /
GK16jgrasg1u:434_0: brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyāt / evam asaṃlakṣyakramatāyām eva / anyathā tu vastumātram” ity
GK16jgrasg1u:434_1: āhuḥ / ete cāsaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyāḥ sahṛdayena rasavyaktau jhagiti jāyamānāyāṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārivimarśakramasya
GK16jgrasg1u:437: atha katham eta eva rasāḥ/ bhagavadālambanasya romāñcāśrupātādibhir anubhāvitasya harṣādibhiḥ paripoṣitasya bhāgavatādipurāṇaśravaṇasamaye bhagavadbhaktair
GK16jgrasg1u:438_0: anubhūyamānasya bhaktirasasya durapahnavatvāt / bhagavadanurāgarūpā bhaktiś cātra
GK16jgrasg1u:438_1: sthāyibhāvaḥ / na cāsau śāntarase 'ntarbhāvam arhati / anurāgasya vairāgyaviruddhatvāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:441: iti hi prācāṃ siddhāntāt/ na ca tarhi kāminīviṣayāyā api rater bhāvatvam astu,
GK16jgrasg1u:442: ratitvāviśeṣāt/ astu vā bhagavadbhakter eva sthāyitvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:444: iti vācyam/ bharatādimunivacanānām evātra rasabhāvatvādivyavasthāpakatvena svātantryayogāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:445_0: anyathā putrādiviṣayāyā api rateḥ sthāyibhāvatvaṃ kuto na syāt / na syād vā kutaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:445_1: śuddhabhāvatvaṃ jugupsāśokādīnām ity akhiladarśanaṃ vyākulī syāt / rasānāṃ navatvagaṇanā
GK16jgrasg1u:447: eteṣāṃ parasparaṃ kair api virodhaḥ/ tatra vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:454_0: śāntaśṛṅgārayoś ca virodhaḥ / atra kavinā prakṛtarasaṃ paripoṣṭukāmena tadabhivyañjake
GK16jgrasg1u:454_1: kāvye tadviruddharasāṅgānāṃ nibandhanaṃ na kāryam / yathā hi sati tadabhivyaktau
GK16jgrasg1u:454_2: viruddhaḥ prakṛtaṃ bādheta / sundopasundanyāyena vobhayor upahatiḥ syāt / yadi tu
GK16jgrasg1u:454_3: viruddhayor api rasayor ekatra samāveśa iṣyate tadā virodhaṃ parihṛtya vidheyaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:454_4: tathā hi-- virodhas tāvad dvividhaḥ / sthitivirodho jñānavirodhaś ca / ādyas
GK16jgrasg1u:457_0: tatrādhikaraṇāntare virodhinaḥ sthāpane prathamo nivartate / yathā nāyakagatatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:457_1: vīrarase varṇanīye pratināyake bhayānakasya / rasapadenātra prakaraṇe tadupādhiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:457_2: sthāyibhāvo gṛhyate / rasasya sāmājikavṛttitvena nāyakādyavṛttitvāt / advitīyānandamayatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:461_1: yathā mannirmitāyām ākhyāyikāyāṃ kaṇvāśramagatasya śvetaketor maharṣeḥ śāntarasapradhāne
GK16jgrasg1u:462: ko 'yam anirvācyo vacanaracanāyā madhurimā” ity adbhutasyāntaravasthāpanena varavarṇinīṃ pratyanurāgavarṇane/
GK16jgrasg1u:466_0: atra surāṅganāmṛtaśarīrālambanayoḥ śṛṅgārabībhatsayor antaḥ svargalābhākṣipto vīraraso
GK16jgrasg1u:466_2: tac ca prakṛtapadye prathamārdha eva śṛṅgāracarvaṇottaraṃ vīrasya carvaṇād anantaraṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:466_3: ca dvitīyārdhe bībhatsasyeti sphuṭam eva / “bhūreṇudigdhān” ity ādi kāvyaprakāśagatapadyakadambetu
GK16jgrasg1u:467: vivekaḥ/ itthaṃ codāsīnacarvaṇena pratibandhakajñānanivṛttau niṣpratyūhaḥ pratibadhyacarvaṇodaya iti phalito 'rthaḥ/ aṅgāṅginoḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:468: aṅginy anyasminn aṅgayor vā na virodhaḥ/ aṅgatvānupapattiprasaṅgāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:470: pratyudgatā savinayaṃ sahasā sakhībhiḥ smeraiḥ smarasya sacivaiḥ sarasāvalokaiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:471: mām adya mañjuracanair vacanaiś ca bāle hā leśato 'pi na kathaṃ vada satkaroṣi//
GK16jgrasg1u:472: iyaṃ ca puro nipatitāṃ pramītāṃ nāyikāṃ prati nāyakasyoktiḥ/ iha nāyikālambanā,
GK16jgrasg1u:473_0: aśrupātādibhir anubhāvair āvegaviṣādādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiś ca vyajyamānā nāyakagatā
GK16jgrasg1u:473_1: ratis tulyasāmagryabhivyakte prakṛtatvāt pradhānībhūte tadgata eva śoke prakarṣakatvād
GK16jgrasg1u:473_2: aṅgam / yadi tu nāyakagatā ratir nātra pratīyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:474_0: kiṃ tu niruktasāmagryā śoka eva prakṛtatvād ity āgṛhyate tadā nāyakālambanā pratyudgamādyanubhāvitā
GK16jgrasg1u:474_1: harṣādibhiḥ poṣitā nāyikāśrayā ratir eva tatrāṅgam astu / nāyikāgatarater nāyakaśokaprakarṣahetutāyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:474_2: sarvasaṃmatatvāt / na ca nāyikāyā nāśāt tadgatāyā rater asaṃnidhānāt katham aṅgateti
GK16jgrasg1u:474_3: vācyam / saṃnidhānasyāṅgatāyām atantratvena smaryamāṇāyās tasyā aṅgatvopapatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:479: yāntīnāṃ gahaneṣu kaṇṭakacitāḥ ke ke na bhūmīruhāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:480_1: vyaktayoḥ karuṇaśṛṅgārayo rājaviṣayakaratibhāvāṅgatvam / kiṃ ca prakṛtarasaparipuṣṭim
GK16jgrasg1u:480_2: icchatā virodhino 'pi rasasya bādhyatvena nibandhanaṃ kāryam eva / tathā hi sati
GK16jgrasg1u:480_3: vairivijayakṛtā varṇyasya kāpi śobhā saṃpadyate / bādhyatvaṃ ca rasasya prabalair
GK16jgrasg1u:480_4: virodhino rasasyāṅgair vidyamāneṣv api svāṅgeṣu niṣpitteḥ pratibandhaḥ / vyabhicāriṇo
GK16jgrasg1u:482_0: na ca virodhyaṅgābhivyatyā pratibandhān nābhivyaktir iti vācyam / tadvyañjakaśabdārthajñānasamaye
GK16jgrasg1u:483_0: bhāvaśabalatāyā ucchedāpatteś ca / rasaniṣpatteḥ pratibandhas tv anubhavasiddha iti
GK16jgrasg1u:483_1: tāṃ praty eva virodhyaṅgānāṃ balavatām abhivyakteḥ pratibandhakatvaṃ nyāyyam / api
GK16jgrasg1u:483_2: ca yatra sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇamahimnā viruddhayor abhivyaktis tatrāpi virodho nivartate /
GK16jgrasg1u:487: ittham avirodhasaṃpādanenāpi nibadhyamāno raso rasaśabdena śṛṅgārādiśabdair vā nābhidhātum ucitaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:488: anāsvādyatāpatteḥ/ tadāsvādaś ca vyañjanamātraniṣpādya ity uktatvāt/ yatra vibhāvādibhir abhivyaktasya rasasya svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra ko doṣa iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:489_0: vyaṅgyasya vācyīkaraṇe sāmānyato vamanākhyadoṣasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt / āsvādyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:489_1: pratyayājanakatayā rasasthale vācyavṛtteḥ kāpeyakalpatvena viśeṣadoṣatvāc ca / evaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:489_2: sthāyivyabhicāriṇām api śabdavācyatvaṃ doṣaḥ / evaṃ vibhāvānubhāvayor asamyakpratyaye
GK16jgrasg1u:489_3: vilambena pratyaye vā na rasāsvāda iti tayor doṣatvam / samabalaprabalapratikūlarasāṅgānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:489_4: nibandhanaṃ tu prakṛtarasapoṣaprātīpikam iti doṣaḥ / prabandhe prakṛtasya prasaṅgāntareṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:489_5: vicchinnasya punardīpane sāmājikānāṃ na sāmagryeṇa rasāsvāda iti vicchinnadīpanaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:490_0: vicchedānarhe ca vicchedaḥ / yathā sandhyāvandanadevayajanādidharmavarṇane prasakte
GK16jgrasg1u:490_1: kayāpi kāminyā saha kasyacitkāmukasyānurāgavarṇane / yathā ca samupasthiteṣu mahāhavadurmadeṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:490_2: pratibhaṭeṣu marmabhindi vacanāny udgiratsu nāyakasya saṃdhyāvandanādivarṇane cety ubhayam anucitam /
GK16jgrasg1u:491_0: evam apradhānasya pratināyakāder nānāvidhānāṃ caritānām anekavidhāyāś ca saṃpado
GK16jgrasg1u:491_1: nāyakasambandhibhyas tebhyo nātiśayo varṇanīyaḥ / yathā sati varṇayitumiṣṭo nāyakasyotkarṣo
GK16jgrasg1u:491_2: na siddhyet / tatprayukto rasapoṣaś ca na syāt / na ca pratināyakotkarṣasya tadabhibhāvakanāyakotkarṣāṅgatvāt
GK16jgrasg1u:491_3: katham avarṇanīyatvam iti vācyam / yādṛśasya pratināyakotkarṣavarṇanasya tadabhibhāvakanāyakotkarṣāṅgatāsaṃpādakatvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:491_4: tādṛśasyeṣṭatvāt / tadvirodhina eva niṣedhyatvāt / na ca pratipakṣasya prakṛtāpekṣayā
GK16jgrasg1u:491_5: varṇyamāno 'py utkarṣaḥ svāśrayahantṛtāmātrād eva prakṛtagatam utkarṣam atiśāyayet,
GK16jgrasg1u:492_0: ato na doṣāvaha iti vācyam / evaṃ hi sati mahārājaṃ kam api viṣaśarakṣepamātreṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:492_1: vyāpāditavato varākasya śabarasyeva prakṛtasya nāyakasya na ko 'py utkarṣaḥ syād
GK16jgrasg1u:492_2: iti / tathā rasālambanāśrayayor anusaṃdhānam antarāntarā viratā na ced,
GK16jgrasg1u:493_0: doṣaḥ / tadanusaṃdhānādhīnā hi rasapratipattidhārā tadananusaṃdhāne viratā syāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:493_1: evaṃ prakṛtarasānupakārakasya vastuno varṇanam api prakṛtarasavirāmahetutvād doṣa
GK16jgrasg1u:493_2: eva / anaucityaṃ tu rasabhaṅgahetutvāt pariharaṇīyam / bhaṅgaś ca pānakādirasādau
GK16jgrasg1u:494: tadbhedaḥ/ jātyāder anucitaṃ yathā--gavādes tejobalakāryāṇi parākramādīni,
GK16jgrasg1u:499: śūdrasya nigamādhyayanam/ brahmacāriṇo yateś ca tāmbūlacarvaṇam,
GK16jgrasg1u:504_1: uttamamadhyamādhamāś ca / tatra ratyādīnāṃ bhayātiriktasthāyibhāvānāṃ sarvatra samatve
GK16jgrasg1u:504_2: 'pi rateḥ saṃbhogarupāyā manuṣyeṣv ivottamadevatāsu sphuṭīkṛtasakalānubhāvavarṇanam anucitam /
GK16jgrasg1u:505_0: krodhasya ca lokabhasmīkaraṇapaṭor dinarātrivyatyayādyanekāścaryakāriṇo divyeṣv ivādivyeṣu /
GK16jgrasg1u:505_2: ca sādhāraṇīkaraṇād ārādhyatvajñānānutpattir iti vācyam / yatra sahṛdayānāṃ rasodbodhaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:505_3: pramāṇasiddhas tatraiva sādhāraṇīkaraṇasya kalpanāt / anyathā svamātṛviṣayakasvapitṛrativarṇane
GK16jgrasg1u:505_4: 'pi sahṛdayasya rasodbodhāpatteḥ / jayadevādibhis tu gītagovindādiprabandheṣu sakalasahṛdayasaṃmato'yaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:505_5: samayo madonmattamataṅgajair iva bhinna iti ca tannidarśanenedānīṃtanena tathā varṇayituṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:505_6: sāṃpratam / tathā vidyāvayovarṇāśramatapobhir utkṛṣṭaiḥ svato 'pakṛṣṭeṣu na sabahumānena
GK16jgrasg1u:505_7: vacasā vyavahartavyam / vyavahartavyaṃ cāpakṛṣṭair utkṛṣṭeṣu / tatrāpi tatrabhavan
GK16jgrasg1u:505_8: bhagavann ityādibhiḥ saṃbodhanair munigurudevatāprabhṛtaya eva na rājādayaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:513: yāvatā tv anaucityena rasasya puṣṭis tāvat tu na vāryate,
GK16jgrasg1u:517: svalpaṃ jalpa bṛhaspate jaḍamate naiṣā sabhā vajriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:518: vīṇāṃ saṃhara nārada stutikathālāpair alaṃ tumburo
GK16jgrasg1u:520_1: sthitadauvārikavacanasya brahmādyadhikṣepaparasyānaucityaṃ na doṣaḥ / evam eva “ale
GK16jgrasg1u:521: hāsyānuguṇatvāt/ eṣā hi digupadarśitā/ anayā sudhībhir anyad apy ūhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:522: raseṣu caiteṣu nigaditeṣu mādhuryaujaḥprasādākhyāṃs trīn guṇān āhuḥ/ tatra “śṛṅgāre saṃyogākhye yanmādhuryaṃ tato 'tiśayitaṃ karuṇe,
GK16jgrasg1u:524_0: tebhyo 'pi śānte / uttarottaram atiśayitāyāś cittadruter jananāt / saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt
GK16jgrasg1u:524_1: karuṇaśāntayos tābhyām api vipralambhe” ity apare / saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇavipralambhaśānteṣv
GK16jgrasg1u:524_2: atiśayitam eva na punas tatrāpi tāratamyam” ity anye / tatra prathamacaramayor matayoḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:524_3: “karuṇe vipralambhe tacchānte cātiśayānvitam” iti prācāṃ sūtram anukūlam / tasyottarasūtragatasya
GK16jgrasg1u:524_4: krameṇeti padasyāpakarṣānapakarṣābhyāṃ vyākhyādvayasya saṃbhavāt / madhyasthe tu
GK16jgrasg1u:524_5: mate karuṇaśāntābhyāṃ vipralambhasya mādhuryātiśaye yadi sahṛdayānām anubhavo 'sti
GK16jgrasg1u:526_0: uttarottaram atiśayitāyāś cittadīpter jananāt / adbhutahāsyabhayānakānāṃ guṇadvayayogitvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:526_1: kecid icchanti / apare tu prasādamātram / prasādas tu sarveṣu raseṣu sarvāsu racanāsu ca sādhāraṇaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:527: guṇānāṃ caiṣāṃ drutidīptivikāsākhyās tisraś cittavṛttayaḥ krameṇa prayojyāḥ/ tattadguṇaviśiṣṭarasacarvaṇājanyā iti yāvat/ evam eteṣu guṇeṣu rasamātradharmeṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:529: ojasvī bandha ity ādayo vyavahārā ākāro 'sya śūra ity ādivyavahāravad aupacārikā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:530: ye 'mī mādhuryaujaḥ prasādārasamātradharmatayoktās teṣāṃ rasadharmatve kiṃ mānam?
GK16jgrasg1u:532_0: na / dāhādeḥ kāryād analagatasyoṣṇasparśasya yathā bhinnatayānubhavas tathā drutyādicittavṛttibhyo
GK16jgrasg1u:533: prātisvikarūpeṇaiva rasānāṃ kāraṇatopapattau guṇakalpane gauravāt/ śṛṅgārakaruṇaśāntānāṃ mādhuryavattvena drutikāraṇatvaṃ,
GK16jgrasg1u:534: prātisvikarūpeṇa kāraṇatvakalpanāpekṣayā laghubhūtam iti tu na vācyam/ pareṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:535: madhuratarādiguṇānāṃ pṛthag drutataratvādi kāryatāratamyaprayojakatayābhyupagamena mādhuryavattvena kāraṇatāyā gaḍubhūtatvāt/ itthaṃ ca prātisvikarūpeṇaiva kāraṇatve lāghavam/
GK16jgrasg1u:536: kiṃ cātmano nirguṇatayātmarūparasaguṇatvaṃ mādhuryādīnām anupapannam/ evaṃ tadupādhiratyādiguṇatvam api,
GK16jgrasg1u:538: pararītyā guṇe guṇāntarasyānaucityāc ca/ atha śṛṅgāro madhura ity ādivyavahāraḥ katham iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:540: prayojakatāsaṃbandhena drutyādikam eva vā mādhuryādikam astu/ vyavahāras tu vājigandhoṣṇetivyavahāravad akṣataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:541_0: prayojakatvaṃ cādṛṣṭādivilakṣaṇaṃ śabdārtharasaracanāgatam eva grāhyam / ato na vyavahārātiprasaktiḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:541_1: tathā ca śabdārthayor api mādhuryāder īdṛśasya sattvād upacāro naiva kalpya iti tu mādṛśāḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:545: iti daśā śabdaguṇān, daśaiva cārthaguṇān āmananti/ nāmāni punas tāny eva, lakṣaṇaṃ tu bhinnam/
GK16jgrasg1u:547: śabdānāṃ bhinnānām apy ekatvapratibhānaprayojakaḥ saṃhitayaikajātīyavarṇavinyāsaviśeṣo gāḍhatvāparaparyāyaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:551: “kiṃ brūmas tava vīratāṃ vayam amī, yasmin dharākhaṇḍala-
GK16jgrasg1u:563: yadi komalatā tavāṅgakānām atha kā nāma kathāpi pallavānām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:567: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:568: atra pūrvārdhe/ uttarārdhe tu mādhuryam api/
GK16jgrasg1u:577_0: “padānāṃ nṛtyatprāyatvaṃ vikaṭatā” iti kāvyaprakāśaṭīkākārā vyācakṣate / udāharanti
GK16jgrasg1u:577_1: ca “svacaraṇaviniviṣṭair nūpurair nartakīnāṃ jhaṭiti raṇitam āsīt” ityādi / tatra
GK16jgrasg1u:578: antarbhāvayan kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ katham anukūla iti ta eva jānanti/ na hy atraujaso vaipulyena pratibhānam asti/
GK16jgrasg1u:579: “viniviṣṭair nūpurair narta-” ity atra sannapy ojaso lavo na camatkārī/ nāpi tatra nṛtyatprāyatvaṃ varṇānām anubhavanti sahṛdayāḥ/ aṃśāntare tu mādhuryam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:586: yathā vā “ayaṃ patatu nirdayam” ityādiprāg udāhṛte/
GK16jgrasg1u:587: avidagdhavaidikādiprayogayogyānāṃ padānāṃ parihāreṇa prayujyamāneṣu padeṣu lokottaraśobhārūpam aujjvalyaṃ kāntiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:590: anayor eva prācīnair ārohāvarohavyapadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ/ krama eva hi tayoḥ prasādād asya bhedakaḥ/ tatra hi tayor vyutkrameṇa vṛtteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:594_0: atrārohaḥ prathame 'rdhe / tṛtīyacaraṇe tv avarohaḥ / gaṅgety ādau mādhuryasya vyañjakeṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:594_1: varṇeṣu satsv api dīrghasamāsāntaḥpātitayāna tasya prarohaḥ / uttarārdhe tu so 'pi /
GK16jgrasg1u:595: evaṃ kriyāparamparayā vidagdhaceṣṭitasya tadasphuṭatvasya tadupapādakayukteś ca sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ saṃsargaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:597: yathā-- “kamalānukāri vadanaṃ kila tasyāḥ” ityādi/ pratyudāharaṇaṃ tu “kamalakāntyanukāri vaktram” ityādi /
GK16jgrasg1u:601: hariṃ sarvatra paśyāmi harer anyan na bhāti me//“
GK16jgrasg1u:602: atra viṣṇur bhrātety ādinirmāṇe prakramabhaṅgātmakaṃ vaiṣamyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:603: ekasyā evokter bhaṅgyantareṇa punaḥ kathanātmakam uktivaicitryaṃ mādhuryam//
GK16jgrasg1u:606: sukhaṃ śeṣe śetāṃ harir avīrataṃ nṛtyatu haraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:608: savitrī kāmānāṃ yadi jagati jāgarti bhavatī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:609: atra vidhyādibhir nāsti kim api prayojanam ity eṣo 'rthaḥ samādhividhānādipreraṇārūpeṇoktivaicitryeṇābhihitaḥ/ anyathānavīkṛtatvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:612: “priyāmaraṇakātaraḥ” ity atra tu śokadāyino maraṇaśabdasya sattvāt pāruṣyam/ idaṃ cāślīlatādoṣavyāpyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:618: “cumbanaṃ dehi me bhārye kāmacāṇḍālatṛptaye” ity ādigrāmyārthaparihāra udāratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:626: prauḍhir vyāsasamāsau ca sābhiprāyatvam asya ca// iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:627: pūrvārdhapratipādyaṃ dvayaṃ vyāsasamāsau ceti catuṣprakārā prauḍhiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:628: sābhiprāyatvaṃ ceti pañcaprakāram oja ity arthaḥ/ prauḍhiḥ pratipādanavaicitryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:634: atroṣasīty ekapadārthasyābhidhānāya prathamacaraṇaḥ/ ity ādyagre 'pi bodhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:637: atra “yasyāḥ parāṅganāgehāt patiḥ prātargṛhe 'ñcati” iti vākyārthe khaṇḍitāpadābhidhānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:638: “ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaś ca na yacchati/
GK16jgrasg1u:639: sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhir ucchṛṅkhalo nṛṇām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:640: atra daivādhīnaṃ sarvam ity ekasmin vākyārthe nānāvākyaracanātmako vyāsapadavācyo vistaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:647: “tataś ca mukto 'bhūd” iti vākyārthakalāpaḥ śatṛ-ktvā-bahuvrīhibhis tiṅantena cānuvādyavidheyabhāvenaikavākyārthīkṛtaḥ/ sābhiprāyatvaṃ caprakṛtārthapoṣakatā/
GK16jgrasg1u:651: atropekṣābhāve karuṇāmūrtitvaṃ poṣakam/ pāpiṣṭhavāt karuṇāyā abhāve prakṛte 'syāḥ saṃpādanāya gaṇikety ādi sīdann iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:653: tac ca sphuṭapratīyamānarasatvam/ udāharaṇaṃ ca varṇitam eva rasaprakaraṇe, varṇayiṣyate ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:654: avarṇitapūrvo 'yam arthaḥ pūrvavarṇitacchāyo veti kaver ālocanaṃ samādhiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:657: dvitīyas tu prāyaśaḥ sarvatraivety āhuḥ/ apare tv eṣu guṇeṣu katipayān prāguktais tribhir guṇair vakṣyamāṇadoṣābhāvālaṃkāraiś ca gatārthayantaḥ kāṃścid vaicitryamātrarūpatayā,
GK16jgrasg1u:658_0: kvacid doṣatayā ca manyamānā na tāvataḥ svīkurvanti / tathā hi-- śleṣodāratāprasādasamādhīnām
GK16jgrasg1u:658_1: ojovyañjakaghaṭanāyām antarbhāvaḥ / na ca śleṣodāratayoḥ sarvāṃśe gāḍhabandhātmanor
GK16jgrasg1u:660_1: vācyam / mādhuryābhivyañjake prasādābhivyañjake veti suvacatvāt / mādhuryaṃ tu pareṣām
GK16jgrasg1u:660_2: asmadabhyupagatamādhuryavyañjakam eva / evaṃ ca sarvatra vyañjake vyaṅgyaśabdaprayogo
GK16jgrasg1u:663: kāvyaṃ tarhi sakhe sukhena kathaya tvaṃ saṃmukhe mādṛśāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:664: no ced duṣkṛtam ātmanā kṛtam iva svāntād bahir mā kṛthāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:665_0: atra pūrvārdhe tṛtīyacaraṇe ca lokottaranirmāṇapratipādake yo mārgo na sa caturthacaraṇe
GK16jgrasg1u:665_1: kadaryakāvyapratipādaka iti vaiṣamyam eva guṇaḥ / grāmyatvakaṣṭatvayos tyāgāt kāntisaukumāryayor
GK16jgrasg1u:666_0: arthaguṇeṣv api-- śleṣaḥ ojasa ādyāś catvāro bhedāś ca uktivaicitryamātrarūpā iti
GK16jgrasg1u:666_1: na guṇāntarbhāvam arhanti / anyathā pratiślokam arthavaicitryavailakṣaṇyād guṇabhedāpatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:674_1: doṣāṇāṃ nirākaraṇena svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasya rasadhvanirasavadalaṃkārayoś ca svīkaraṇena
GK16jgrasg1u:674_2: ca gatārthāni / samādhis tu kavigataḥ kāvyasya kāraṇaṃ na tu guṇaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:675: pratibhāyā api kāvyaguṇatvāpatteḥ/ atas traya eva guṇā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:676: tatra ṭavargavarjitānāṃ vargāṇāṃ prathamatṛtīyaiḥ śarbhir antasthaiś ca ghaṭitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:677: naikaṭyena prayuktair anusvāraparasavarṇāiḥ śuddhānunāsikaiś ca śobhitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:678: vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca niṣiddhaiḥ saṃyogādyair acumbitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:679: avṛttir muduvṛttirvā racanānupūrvyātmikā mādhuryasya vyañjikā/ dvitīyacaturthās tu vargyā guṇasyāsya nānukūlāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:681: dūratayā saṃniveśitāś cet/ naikaṭyena tu pratikūlā api bhavanti,
GK16jgrasg1u:682: yadi tadāyatto nānuprāsaḥ/ anye tu vargasthānāṃ pañcānām apy aviśeṣeṇa mādhuryavyañjakatām āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:685: svānta me kalaya śāntaye ciraṃ naicikīnayanacumbitāṃ śriyam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:688: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:689_1: vā dhvanyamānāyāḥ śānta eva paryavasānāt tadgatamādhuryasyābhivyañjikā racaneyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:689_4: āliṅgito dīrghavṛttyātmā gumpha ojasaḥ / asmin patitāḥ prathamatṛtīyavargyā guṇasyāsya
GK16jgrasg1u:690_0: tadghaṭakās tv anukūlā eva / evam anusvāraparasavarṇā api / yathā-- “ayaṃ patatu
GK16jgrasg1u:690_1: nirdayaṃ dalitadṛpta-” ity ādau prāgudāhṛte / śrutamātrā vākyārtham karatalabadaram
GK16jgrasg1u:690_2: iva nivedayantī ghaṭanā prasādasya / ayaṃ ca sarvasādhāraṇo guṇaḥ / udāharaṇāny atra
GK16jgrasg1u:690_3: prāyaśo madīyāni sarvāṇy eva padyāni / tathāpi yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:692: prāṇeśaḥ praṇayākulaḥ punar asāv āstāṃ samastā kathā/
GK16jgrasg1u:693: etat tvāṃ vinivedayāmi mama ceduktiṃ hitāṃ manyase
GK16jgrasg1u:694: mugdhe mā kuru mānam ānanam idaṃ rākāpatir jeṣyati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:695: atra sarvāvacchedena prasādābhivyañjakatvam aṃśabhedena tu mādhuryaujobhivyañjakatvam api,
GK16jgrasg1u:696: manasijāntasya mā kurv ādeś ca mādhuryābhivyaktihetutvāt/ sakhya ityāder ojogamakatvāt/ nanv atra śṛṅgārāśrayasya mādhuryasyābhivyaktaye tadanukūlās tu nāma racanā,
GK16jgrasg1u:697: ojasas tu kaḥ prasaṅgo yad arthaṃ tadanukūlavarṇavinyāsa iti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:698_0: nāyikāmānopaśāntaye kṛtānekayatnāyās tadīyaṃ hitam upadiśantyāḥ sakhyāḥ sakrodhatvasya
GK16jgrasg1u:698_1: vyañjanīyatayā tathāvinyāsasya sāphalyāt / kiṃ bahunā rasasyaujasvino 'marṣāder bhāvasya
GK16jgrasg1u:698_2: cāvivakṣāyām api vaktari kruddhatayā prasiddhe vācye vā krūratare ākhyāyikādau prabandhe vā,
GK16jgrasg1u:700: vācā nirmalayā sudhāmadhurayā yāṃ nātha śikṣāmadās
GK16jgrasg1u:701: tāṃ svapne 'pi na saṃspṛśāmy aham ahaṃbhāvāvṛto nistrapaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:702: ity āgaḥśataśālinaṃ punar api svīyeṣu māṃ bibhratas
GK16jgrasg1u:703: tvatto nāsti dayānidhir yadupate matto na mattaḥ paraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:705_0: tattadguṇavyañjanakṣamāyā nirmiteḥ paricayāya sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca varjanīyaṃ kiṃcin
GK16jgrasg1u:705_1: nirūpyate-- varṇānāṃ svānantaryaṃ sakṛdekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam / yathā-- “kakubhasurabhiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:707_0: palalam ivābhāti” ity ādau / asakṛc ced adhikam // yathā-- “vitatatarastarur eṣa
GK16jgrasg1u:707_1: bhāti bhūmau“ / evaṃ bhinnapadagatatve 'pi / yathā-- “śuka karoṣi kathaṃ vijane rucim”
GK16jgrasg1u:707_2: ity ādau / asakṛdbhinnapadagatatve tato 'py adhikam / yathā-- “pika kakubho mukharīkuru
GK16jgrasg1u:707_3: prakāmam“ / evaṃ svasamānavargyānantaryaṃ sakṛd ekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:707_4: yathā-- “vitathas te manorathaḥ“ / asakṛc ced adhikam / yathā-- “vitathataraṃ vacanaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:707_5: tava pratīmaḥ“ / evaṃ bhinnapadagatatve / yathā-- “atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā” ity ādau /
GK16jgrasg1u:707_6: asakṛd bhinnapadagatatve tu tato 'py adhikam / “atha tathā kuru yena sukhaṃ labhe“ /
GK16jgrasg1u:707_7: etac ca vargāṇāṃ prathamadvitīyayos tṛtīyacaturthayor ānantaryam / prathamatṛtīyayor
GK16jgrasg1u:707_8: dvitīyatṛtīyayor vānantaryaṃ tu tathā nāśrāvyam / kiṃ tv īṣat,
GK16jgrasg1u:708_0: nirmāṇamārmikaikavedyam / etad apy asakṛc cet tato 'dhikatvāt sādhāraṇair api vedyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:708_1: yathā-- “khaga kalānidhir eṣa vijṛmbhate“ / “iti vadati divāniśaṃ sa dhanyaḥ“ / pañcamānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:708_2: madhuratvena svavargyānantaryaṃ na tathā / yathā-- “tanute tanutāṃ tanau“ / svānantaryaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:708_3: tv aśravyam eva / yathā-- “mama mahatī manasi vyathāvirāsīt“ / etāni cāśravyatvāni
GK16jgrasg1u:710: “yathā yathā tāmarasāyatekṣaṇā mayā sarāgaṃ nitarāṃ niṣevitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:711: tathā tathā tattvakatheva sarvato vikṛṣya mām ekarasaṃ cakāra sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:715: idaṃ tu bodhyam-- gurur yayor vyavadhāyakas tayor eva varṇayor ānantaryakṛtam aśravyatvam apavadati/ tenātra thakāratakārānantaryakṛtadoṣāpavāde 'pi
GK16jgrasg1u:716_0: takārathakārānantaryakṛtam aśravyatvam anapoditam eva / evaṃ tryādīnāṃ saṃyogo 'pi
GK16jgrasg1u:716_1: prāyeṇāśravyaḥ / “rāṣṭre tavoṣṭryaḥ paritaś caranti” ity evamādayaḥ śṛutikāṭavabhedā
GK16jgrasg1u:716_2: anye 'py anubhavānusāreṇa bodhyāḥ / atha dīrghānantaryaṃ saṃyogasya bhinnapadagatasya
GK16jgrasg1u:716_3: sakṛd apy aśravyam, asakṛt tu sutarām /
GK16jgrasg1u:719: ekapadagatasya tu tathā nāśravyatvam/ yathā-- “jāgratā vicitaḥ panthāḥ śātravāṇāṃ vṛthodyamaḥ“/ parasavarṇakṛtasya tu saṃyogasya sarvathā dīrghād
GK16jgrasg1u:720_0: bhinnapadagatatvābhāvān madhuratvāc cānantaryaṃ na manāg apy aśravyam / yathā-- “tāṃtamālatarukānti-”
GK16jgrasg1u:720_1: ity ādipadye / atra tām ity atra nīm ity atra ca parasavarṇasya pūrvapadabhaktatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:720_2: na saṃyogo bhinnapadagataḥ / pratyekaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñeti pakṣe 'pi bhinnapadagataḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:720_3: saṃyogo na dīrghād avyavahitaparaḥ / navāmbudety atra tv ekādeśasya padadvayabhaktatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:720_4: dīrghād bhinnapadagatatve saty avyavahitottaratvaṃ yady api parasavarṇakṛtasaṃyogasya
GK16jgrasg1u:720_5: bhavati tathāpy atra bhinnapadagatatvam ekapadagatabhinnatvaṃ vivakṣitam ity adoṣaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:720_6: asakṛt tu sutarām / yathā-- “eṣāṃ priyā me kva gatā trapākulā“ / idaṃ cāśravyatvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:721_0: atha svecchayā saṃdhyakaraṇaṃ sakṛd apy aśravyam / yathā-- “ramyāṇi indumukhi te
GK16jgrasg1u:721_1: kilakiñcitāni / pragṛhyatāprayuktaṃ tv asakṛd eva / aho amī indumukhīvilāsāḥ“ / evam
GK16jgrasg1u:721_2: eva ca ya-va-lopaprayuktam “apara iṣavaete kāminīnāṃ dṛgantāḥ“ /
GK16jgrasg1u:724: tārā iva turagā iva sukhalīnā mantriṇo bhavataḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:725: iti bhavadīyaṃ kāvyam iti ced akṛtvaiva yalopaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:727: evaṃ rorutvasya hali lopasya yaṇguṇavṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvarūpādīnāṃ naikaṭyena bāhulyam aśravyatāhetuḥ/ evam ime sarve 'py aśravyabhedāḥ kāvyasāmānye varjanīyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:728: atha viśeṣato varjanīyāḥ/ tatra madhuraraseṣu ye viśeṣato varjanīyā anupadaṃ vakṣyante ta evaujasviṣv anukūlāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:729_0: ye cānukūlatayoktās te pratikūlā iti sāmānyato nirṇayaḥ / madhuraraseṣu dīrghasamāsaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:732: sāyāhani praṇayino bhavanaṃ vrajantyāś ceto na kasya harate gatir aṅganāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:735: vedhā vidhāya punar uktam ivendubimbaṃ dūrīkaroti na kathaṃ viduṣāṃ vareṇyaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:736_0: atra bhriśabdaparyantaṃ śṛṅgārānanuguṇam / śiṣṭaṃ tu ramaṇīyam / uttarārdhe kakāratakārarūpajhaydvayasaṃyogasya
GK16jgrasg1u:736_1: sattve 'pi prācuryābhāvān na doṣaḥ / yadi tu “dantāṃśukāntam aravindaramāpahāri
GK16jgrasg1u:737: sāndrāmṛtam, ity ādi kriyate tadā sarvam eva ramaṇīyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:743: “kalitakuliśaghātāẖ ke 'pi khelanti vātāḥ kuśalam iha kathaṃ vā jāyatāṃ jīvite me/
GK16jgrasg1u:744: ayam api bata guñjannāli mākandamaulau culukayati madīyāṃ cetanāṃ cañcarīkaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:745: atra dvitīyajihvāmūlīyaparyantam ananuguṇaṃ mādhuryasya/ yadi ca “kathaya katham ivāśā jāyatāṃ jīvite me malayabhujagavāntā vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ” iti vidhīyate, tathā nāyaṃ doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:748: capalopamitā khalu svayaṃ yā bata loke sukhasādhanaṃ kathaṃ sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:749: atra dvāv upadhmānīyāv eva na śāntānuguṇau/
GK16jgrasg1u:751: “vacane tava yatra mādhurī sā hṛdi pūrṇā karuṇā ca komale 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:752: adhunā hariṇākṣi hā kathaṃ vā kaṭutā tatra kaṭhoratāvirāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:753: adhunā sakhi tatra hā kathaṃ vā gatir anyaiva vilokyate guṇānām” iti tv anuguṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:755: tulām anālokya nijām akharvaṃ gaurāṅgi garvaṃ na kadāpi kuryāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:757: yadi tu “tulām anālokya mahītale 'smin” iti nirmīyate tathā sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:758_0: halāṃ la-ma-na-bhinnānāṃsvātmanā saṃyogasyāsakṛt prayogo yathā-- “vigaṇayya me nikāyyaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:758_1: tām anuyāto 'si naiva tannyāyyam /” la-ma-nānāṃ svātmanā saṃyogas tu na tathā pāruṣyam āvahati /yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:759: “iyam ullasitā mukhasya śobhā pariphullaṃ nayanāmbujadvayaṃ te/
GK16jgrasg1u:760: jaladālim ayaṃ jagadvitanvan kalitaḥ kvāpi kim āli nīlameghaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:762: “ā sāyaṃ salilabhare savitāram upāsya sādaraṃ tapasā/
GK16jgrasg1u:763: adhunābjena manāk tava mānini tulanā mukhasyāptā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:764: atra dvitīyārdham aramyam/ “sarasijakulena saṃprati bhāmini te mukhatulādhigatā” iti tu sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:766: ayi mandasmitamadhuraṃ vadanaṃ tanvaṅgi yadi manāk kuruṣe/
GK16jgrasg1u:767: adhunaiva kalaya śamitaṃ rākāramaṇasya hanta sāmrājyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:769_1: tṛtīyasaṃyogasya cāsaṃbhavāt savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyoganiṣedho niravakāśa iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:770: na/ sakṛt prayogaviṣayatvenāsya pārthakyāt/ ānyathā “manāk kuruṣe” iti nirdoṣaṃ syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:776_0: yaṅalugantāny anyāni ca śābdikapriyāṇy api madhurarase na prayuñjīta / evaṃ vyaṅgyacarvaṇātiriktayojanāviśeṣāpekṣānāpātato
GK16jgrasg1u:776_1: 'dhikacamatkāriṇo 'nuprāsanicayān yamakādīṃś ca saṃbhavato 'pi kavir na nibadhnīyāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:776_2: yato hi te rasacarvaṇāyām anantarbhavantaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayaṃ svābhimukhaṃ vidadhānā
GK16jgrasg1u:776_3: rasaparāṅmukhaṃ vidadhīran /vipralambhe tu sutarām / yato madhuratamatvenāsya nirmalasitānirmitapānakarasasyeva
GK16jgrasg1u:776_4: tanīyān api svātantryam āvahan padārthaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāruṃtudatayāna sarvathaiva
GK16jgrasg1u:780: ye tu punar akliṣṭatayānunnataskandhatayā ca na pṛthag bhāvanām apekṣante,
GK16jgrasg1u:781: kiṃ tu rasacarvaṇāyām eva susukhaṃ gocarīkartuṃ śakyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:785: āli vidhāya sāyaṃ smerānanā sapadi śīlaya saudhamaulim/
GK16jgrasg1u:786: prauḍhiṃ bhajantu kumudāni mudām udārām ullāsayantu parito harito mukhāni//“
GK16jgrasg1u:787: ittham ete prasaṅgato madhurarasābhivyañjikāyāṃ racanāyāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā doṣāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:788: “ebhir viśeṣaviṣayaiḥ sāmānyair api ca dūṣaṇai rahitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:791: tāṃ vibudhā vaidarbhīṃ vadanti vṛttiṃ gṛhītaparipākām//
GK16jgrasg1u:792: asyām udāhṛtāny eva kiyanty api padyāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:796: vāme mānam apākaroṣi na manāg adyāpi roṣeṇa te
GK16jgrasg1u:797: hā hā bālamṛṇālato 'py atitamāṃ tanvī tanus tāmyati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:798: asyāś ca rīter nirmāṇe kavinā nitarām avahitena bhāvyam/ anyathā tu paripākabhaṅgaḥ syāt/ yathāmarukakavipadye--
GK16jgrasg1u:800: nidrāvyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham/
GK16jgrasg1u:802: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:803: atrotthāya kiṃcicchanair ity atra savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyogas tatrāpi naikaṭyeneti sutarām aśravyaḥ/ evaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:805: nirvarṇya patyur mukham ity atra ca rephaghaṭitasaṃyogasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:806: jhayghaṭitasaṃyogaparahrasvasya ca prācuryam/ vistrabdham ity atra mahāprāṇaghaṭitasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:810: lokateś ca dhātor dviḥ prayogaḥ kaver nirmāṇasāmagrīdāridryaṃ prakāśayati/ ity alaṃ parakīyakāvyavimarśanena/ iti saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā rasāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:811: atha bhāvadhvanir nirūpyate/ atha kiṃ bhāvatvam/ vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatve sati rasavyañjakatvam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:812_1: vyañjakatve viśeṣite tv asaṃbhavaḥ prasajyeta / bhāvasyāpi bhāvanādvāraiva vyañjakatvāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:813_0: bhāvanāyām ativyāptyāpatteś ca / ata eva ca vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatvasyeva śabdabhinnatvasyāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:813_1: tadviśeṣaṇatve na nistāraḥ / pradhānadhvanyamānabhāve rasavyañjakatābhāvād avyāptyāpatteś ca /
GK16jgrasg1u:814: na ca tatrāpi prānte raso 'bhivyajyata eveti vācyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:815_0: bhāvadhvanivilopaprasaṅgāt / bhāvacamatkāraprakarṣād bhāvadhvanitvam / rasas tu tatra
GK16jgrasg1u:815_1: vyajyamāno 'py acamatkāritvān na dhvanivyapadeśahetur ity api na śakyaṃ vaditum /
GK16jgrasg1u:815_2: camatkārarahitarasavyaktau mānābhāvāt / rase hi dharmigrāhakamānenānandāṃśāvinābhāvasya prāg evāvedanāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:816_0: astu vā prādhānyena dhvanyamānasyāpi bhāvasya prānte rasābhivyañjakatvam / tathāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:816_3: tattvam /bhāvādicarvaṇāyām atiprasaṅgavāraṇāya carvaṇāviṣayeti cittavṛttiviśeṣaṇam iti vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:821: cittavṛttitvāc ca/ nāpy akhaṇḍam/ tattve mānābhāvāt/ atrocyate--
GK16jgrasg1u:824_0: harṣādīnāṃ ca sāmājikagatānām eva sthāyibhāvanyāyenābhivyaktiḥ / sāpi rasanyāyeneti
GK16jgrasg1u:824_1: kecit / vyaṅgyāntaranyāyenetyapare manyante / vibhāvānubhāvau cātra vyañjakau / na
GK16jgrasg1u:824_2: tv ekasmin vyābhicāriṇi dhvanyamāne vyabhicāryantaraṃ vyañjakatayāvaśyam apekṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:825_0: tasyaiva prādhānyāpatteḥ / vastutas tu prakaraṇādivaśāt prādhānyam anubhavati kasmiṃś
GK16jgrasg1u:825_1: cid bhāve tadīyasāmagrīvyaṅgyatvena nāntarīyakatayā tanimānam āvahato vyabhicāryantarasyāṅgatve
GK16jgrasg1u:826: amarṣādau vā garvasya/ na caivaṃ sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvāpattiḥ/ pṛthagvibhāvānubhāvābhivyaktasyaiva (bhāvasya)
GK16jgrasg1u:828: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśahetutvāt/ ata eva nāntarīyakasya bhāvasya dhvananaṃ bhavati/ anyathā garvādidhvaner uccheda eva bhavet/
GK16jgrasg1u:829: vibhāvas tv atra vyabhicāriṇo nimittakāraṇasāmānyam/ na tu rasasyeva sarvathaivālambanoddīpane apekṣite/ yadi tu kvacit saṃbhavatas tadā na vāryete/
GK16jgrasg1u:831_1: pratipakṣakṛtadhikkārādijanmā nirvedaś ceti trayastriṃśad vyabhicāriṇaḥ / gurudevanṛpaputrādiviṣayā
GK16jgrasg1u:832: etena vātsalyākhyaṃ putrādyālambanaṃ rasāntaram iti parāstam/ ucchṛṅkhalatāyā munivacanaparāhatatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:838: tathotpattiś ca putrāder vibhāvo yatra jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:840: aśrusvedādayaś cānubhāvā harṣaṃ tam ādiśet//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:843: avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:847: “tanmañju mandahasitaṃ śvasitāni tāni sā vai kalaṅkavidhurā madhurānanaśrīḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:848: adyāpi me hṛdayam unmadayanti hanta sāyaṃtanāmbujasahodaralocanāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:849: cintāviśeṣo 'tra vibhāvaḥ/ bhrūnnatigātraniścalatvādaya ākṣepagamyā anubhāvāḥ/ yady apy atrāsyā eva smṛteḥ saṃcāriṇyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:851_1: rasadhvanitvaṃ śakyate vaktum tathāpi smṛter evātra puraḥsphūrtikatvāc camatkāritvāc ca taddhvanitvam
GK16jgrasg1u:853_0: tadāder buddhisthaprakārāvacchinne śaktir iti naye buddheḥ śakyatāvacchedakānugamakatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:853_1: na vācyatāsaṃsparśaḥ / buddhisthatvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakam iti naye 'pi smṛtitvena
GK16jgrasg1u:853_2: smṛter vyaktivedyataiva / tasyāś cātra vākyavedyatve 'pi padasyaiva kurvadrūpatvāt
GK16jgrasg1u:853_3: padadhvaniviṣayatvam / etena bhāvānāṃ padavyaṅgatve na vaicitryam iti parāstam /
GK16jgrasg1u:859: anyasya tu vyañjitasya bhāvatvam iti siddhāntāt/ kiṃ tu vibhāva eva sundaratvāt kathaṃcid rasaparyavasāyī/
GK16jgrasg1u:860: strīṇāṃ puruṣamukhāvalokanādeḥ puṃsāṃ ca pratijñābhaṅgaparābhavāder utpanno vaivarṇyādhomukhatvādikāraṇībhūtaś cittavṛttiviśeṣo vrīḍā//
GK16jgrasg1u:867: tena nāyikākartṛkatatkucāntarvartipriyanakhakṣatāvalokanajanyaharṣāvedakatatpulakāder darśanaṃ ca vibhāvaḥ/ sadyaḥ sadanapraveśo
GK16jgrasg1u:870: “niruddhya yāntīṃ tarasā kapotīṃ kūjatkapotasya puro dadāne/
GK16jgrasg1u:871: mayi smitārdraṃ vadanāravindaṃ sā mandamandaṃ namayāṃbabhūva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:872: pūrvatra trāsa ivātrāpi harṣo leśatayā sannapi vrīḍāyā anuguṇa eva/ priyakartṛkaṃ kapotasyāgre kapotyāḥ samarpaṇaṃ vibhāvaḥ/ vadananamanam anubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:877: āgatam api taṃ savidhe paricayahīneva vīkṣate bālā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:878: atra kāntaviyogo vibhāvaḥ/ indriyavaikalyaṃ lajjādyabhāvaś cānubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:881: naivākarṣaty ambu naivāmbujāliṃ kāntāpetaḥ kṛtyaśūnyo gajendraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:884: “saṃtāpayāmi hṛdayaṃ dhāvaṃ dhāvaṃ dharātale kim aham/
GK16jgrasg1u:887: atra vivekaśrutasaṃpattyādir vibhāvaḥ/ cāpalādyupaśamo 'nubhāvaḥ/ nanu cottarārdhe cintā nāstīti vastuno 'bhivyakteḥ katham asya dhṛtibhāvadhvanitvam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:889: kim aniṣṭaṃ mama bhaviṣyatīty ākāraś cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śaṅkā//
GK16jgrasg1u:891: “vidhivañcitayā mayā na yātaṃ sakhi saṃketaniketanaṃ priyasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:892: adhunā bata kiṃ vidhātukāmo mayi kāmo nṛpatiḥ punar na jāne//“
GK16jgrasg1u:893: atra rājāparādho vibhāvaḥ/ mukhavaivarṇyādaya ākṣepyā anubhāvāḥ/ iyaṃ tu bhayādyutpādanena kampādikāriṇī, na tu cintā/
GK16jgrasg1u:897: priyam āgatam api savidhe satkurute madhuravīkṣaṇair eva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:898: atra priyaviraho vibhāvaḥ/ madhuravīkṣaṇair evety evakāreṇa bodhyamānā pratyudgamacaraṇanipatanāśleṣādīnāṃ nivṛttir anubhāvaḥ/ na cātra śramaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:899_0: kāraṇābhāvāt / kecit tu vyādhyādiprabhavabalanāśaṃ glānim āhuḥ / teṣāṃ mate cittavṛttyātmakeṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:899_1: bhāveṣu nāśarūpāyā glāneḥ kathaṃ samāveśa iti dhyeyam / yady api “balasyāpacayo glānir
GK16jgrasg1u:899_2: ādhivyādhisamudbhavaḥ” iti lakṣaṇavākyād apacayaśabdena nāśa eva pratiyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:900: tathāpi prāg uktānupapattyā balanāśajanyaṃ duḥkham eva balāpacayaśabdena
GK16jgrasg1u:905: adhunā mama kutra sā satī patitasyeva parā sarasvatī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:906: sītāṃ parityaktavato bhagavataḥ śrīrāmabhadrasyeyam uktiḥ/ atra sītāparityāgarūpo 'parādhas tajjanyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā vibhāvaḥ/ patitasāmyarūpasvāpakarṣabhāṣaṇam anubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:912: atra hatakena mayā vivāsitā na tu vidhinety etasyārthasya patitopamayaiva paripoṣaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:913_0: na tu śūdrādyupamayā / yataḥ śūdrasya jātyaiva śrutidaurlabhyaṃ vidhinā kṛtam / patitasya
GK16jgrasg1u:913_1: tu brāhmaṇāder vidhinā śrutisulabhatve svabhāvena kṛte 'pi tenaiva tathāvidhaṃ pāpam
GK16jgrasg1u:913_2: ācaratā svataḥ śrutir dūrīkṛteti tasya patitena sāmyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:914_0: tasyāś ca śrutyety upamālaṃkāro dainyam evālaṃkurute / tathā mayeti seti copādānalakṣaṇāmūladhvanibhyāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:921: adhṛtiś cānubhāvāḥ syuḥ sā cintā parikīrtitā//
GK16jgrasg1u:922: vitarko 'syāḥ kṣaṇe pūrve pāścāttye vopajāyate//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:923: “dhyānaṃ cintā hitānāpteḥ saṃtāpādikarī matā/” iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:926: akṛtapratimā tanuḥ kṛtā vidhinā kasya kṛte mṛgīdṛśaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:927_0: atra tadaprāptir vibhāvaḥ / anutāpādaya ākṣepyā anubhāvāḥ / na cātrautsukyadhvanir
GK16jgrasg1u:927_1: iti vācyam / kasya kṛtaity anirdhāritadharmyālambanāyāś cintāyā eva pratīyamānatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:930: “saṃmohānandasaṃdoho mado madyopayogajaḥ/” iti/ tatrottame puruṣe svāpo 'nubhāvaḥ/ madhyame hasitagāne/ nīce tu rodanaparuṣoktyādi/ ayaṃ madas trividhaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:931_1: sa ādyāḥ / bhujākṣepaskhalitaghūrṇitādibhir madhyamaḥ / gatibhaṅgasmṛtināśahikkācchardyābhir adhamaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:933: “madhurataraṃ smayamānaḥ svasminn evālapañ śanaiḥ kim api/
GK16jgrasg1u:935_0: atra mādakadravyasevanaṃ vibhāvaḥ / avyaktālāpādy anubhāvaḥ / atra mattasvabhāvavarṇanasya
GK16jgrasg1u:935_1: tanniṣṭhamadavyañjanārthatvān madabhāva eva pradhānam iti na svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasyaprādhānyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:938: “madhurasān madhuraṃ hi tavādharaṃ taruṇi madvadane viniveśaya/
GK16jgrasg1u:939: mama gṛhāṇa kareṇa karāmbujaṃ papapatāmi hahā bhabhabhūtale//“
GK16jgrasg1u:940_0: atrāpi sa eva vibhāvaḥ / adhikavarṇoccāraṇādir anubhāvaḥ / pūrvārdhagatā grāmyoktir
GK16jgrasg1u:940_1: uttarārdhe ca taruṇīkare 'mbujopameyatayā nirūpaṇīye svakarasya tadupameyatayā nirūpaṇaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:945: niḥśvāsairjṛmbhitair mandaiḥ pādotkṣepaiḥ śramo mataḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:947: ayaṃ ca saty api bale jāyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:949: na tu glāniḥ/ ato glāneḥ śramasya bhedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:952: cirāya citre likhiteva tanvī na spandituṃ mandam api kṣamāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:953_1: na cātra nidrābhāvadhvananena gatārthateti śaṅkyam / suṣuptau hi jñānarāhityenaiva
GK16jgrasg1u:953_2: yatnarāhityān mandam api spandituṃ na kṣamāsīd ity asyānatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:954: śīṅābhihitatayā tasyā vyaṅgyatvānupapatteś ca/ śrame tv ānuguṇyam ucitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:957: “ā mūlād ratnasānor malayavalayitād ā ca kūlāt payodher
GK16jgrasg1u:958: yāvantaḥ santi kāvyapraṇayanapaṭavas te viśaṅkaṃ vadantu/
GK16jgrasg1u:960: vācām ācāryatāyāḥ padam anubhavituṃ ko 'sti dhanyo madanyaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:961: atra svakīyakavitāyā ananyasādhāraṇatājñānaṃ vibhāvaḥ/ parādhikṣepaparaitādṛśavākyaprayogo 'nubhāvaḥ/ imaṃ cāsūyāpi leśataḥ puṣṇāti/ utsāhapradhāno gūḍhagarvo hi vīrarasadhvaniḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:962_0: ayaṃ tu garvapradhāna iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ / tathā hi vīrarasaprasaṅge prāg udāhṛte
GK16jgrasg1u:962_1: “yadi vakti-“ityādi padye gīṣpatināgirām adhidevatayāpi sākam ahaṃ vadiṣyāmīti vacanenābhivyaktasyotsāhasya
GK16jgrasg1u:962_2: paripoṣakatayā sthitaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paṇḍitebhyo 'ham adhika iti garvaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:963: na tu prakṛtapadya iva nāsty eva mahītale madanya iti sphuṭoditena solluṇṭhavacanenānubhāvena prādhānyena pratīyamānaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:968: bodhitāpi bubudhe madhūpair na prātar ānanajasaurabhalubdhaiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:973: “nikhilaṃ jagad eva naśvaraṃ punar asmin nitarāṃ kalevaram/
GK16jgrasg1u:974: atha tasya kṛte kiyānayaṃ kriyate hanta mayā pariśramaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:975_1: svanindā rājasevādiviratir vitṛṣṇatā cānubhāvaḥ / jhagiti mater eva camatkārād dhvanivyapadeśahetutā,
GK16jgrasg1u:983: iha tatprabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:985: “hṛdaye kṛtaśaivalānuṣaṅgā muhur aṅgāni yatas tataḥ kṣipantī/
GK16jgrasg1u:986: tadudantapare mukhe sakhīnām atidīnām iyam ādadhāti dṛṣṭim//“
GK16jgrasg1u:994: ārād upākarṇya giraṃ madīyāṃ saudāminīyāṃ suṣamā mayāsīt//
GK16jgrasg1u:995: atra patyā svavacanākarṇanaṃ vibhāvaḥ/ palāyanam anubhāvaḥ/ na cātra lajjāyā vyaṅgyatvam āśaṅkanīyam/ śaiśavenaiva tasyā nirāsāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:998: kuru kaśāṃ karābje karuṇāvati kampate mama svāntam/
GK16jgrasg1u:999: khelan na jātu gopair amba vilambaṃ kariṣyāmi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1002: svapna iti yāvat/ asyānubhāvaḥ pralāpādiḥ/ netranimīlanādayas tu nidrāyā evānubhāvā na tv asya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1003: anidaṃjanyatvāt/ yat tu prācīnaiḥ “asyānubhāvā nibhṛtagātranetranimīlanaṃ” ityādy uktaṃ tadanyathāsiddhānām api teṣām etadbhāvavyāpakatvād iti dhyeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1006: tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅ mayety anubhāṣiṇīm/
GK16jgrasg1u:1008: ka iha bhavatīṃ bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1009_0: eṣā pravāsagatasya svapne 'pi priyām evaṃbhāṣiṇīṃ dṛṣṭavato nidrāṃ prati kasyacid
GK16jgrasg1u:1009_1: uktiḥ / yady apy evaṃbhūtāyāḥ priyatamāvasthāyā nivedanena nidre mama bhavatyā mahānupakāraḥ kṛta iti vastu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1012: na prānte tayor dhvananaṃ niroddhum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1014: nidrānāśaś ca tatpūrtisvapnāntabalavacchabdasparśādibhir jāyata iti ta evātra vibhāvāḥ/ akṣimardanagātramardanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1017: “nitarāṃ hitayādya nidrayā me bata yāme carame niveditāyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1018: sudṛśo vacanaṃ śṛṇomi yāvan mayi tāvat pracukopa vārivāhaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1019: atra garjitaśravaṇaṃ vibhāvaḥ/ priyāvacanaśravaṇollāsanāśo 'nubhāvas tūnneyaḥ/ kecid avidyādhvaṃsajanyam apy amum āmananti/ teṣāṃ mate--
GK16jgrasg1u:1022_0: iti gītāpadyam udāhāryam / na tu vārivāhaviṣayāyā asūyāyā evātra vākyārthateti śaṅkyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:1022_1: vibodhapratītau hi satyāṃ tasminn anaucityāvagame saty anucitavibodhajanakatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:1023: paramukhanirīkṣakatvāt/ syād api tasyā api prādhānyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1024: yadi vārivāhe niṣkaruṇatvādibodhakaṃ kiṃcid api syāt/ nāpi svapnasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1025: vārivāhanādena tannāśasyaiva pratipatteḥ/ astu vā svapnabhāvapraśamenāsūyayā ca sahāsya saṃkaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1028: nidrāṃ vihāya sa prātar āliliṅgātha cetanām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1029_0: vibodhasya cetanāpadavācyatvāt / yathā kaścit satyapratijño dvābhyāṃ nāyikābhyāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1029_1: dvau kālāv upabhogārthaṃ dattvā yathocite kāla ekām upabhujya kālakantare pravṛtte
GK16jgrasg1u:1030: tathaivāyaṃ rātrau nidrāṃ prātaś cetanām iti samāsokter eveha prakāśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1036: śoṇāgrābhyāṃ bhāminī locanābhyāṃ joṣaṃ joṣam joṣam evāvatasthe//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1037: iha tv ākasmikastanāgrasparśo vibhāvaḥ/ nayanāruṇyanirnimeṣanirīkṣaṇe anubhāvau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1038: nanu krodhāmarṣayoḥ sthāyisaṃcāriṇor bhāvayoḥ kiṃ bhedakam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1039: viṣayatāvailakṣaṇyam eveti gṛhāṇa/ tatra tu gamakaṃ jhaṭiti paravināśādau pravṛttir vacanavaimukhyādikaṃ ceti kāryavailakṣaṇyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1040: vrīḍādibhir nimittair harṣādyanubhāvānāṃ gopanāya janito bhāvaviśeṣo 'vahittham//
GK16jgrasg1u:1050: vrīḍā vibhāvaḥ/ tādṛśakāliyakathāprasaṅgo 'nubhāvaḥ/ evaṃ bhayādiprayojyam apy udāhāryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1051: adhikṣepāpamānādiprabhavā kim asya karomītyādyākārā cittavṛttir ugratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1054: vibhāvāḥ syur atho bandho vadhas tāḍanabhanabhartsane//
GK16jgrasg1u:1057: “avāpya bhaṅgaṃ khalu saṃgarāṅgaṇe nitāntam aṅgādhipater amaṅgalam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1058: paraprabhāvaṃ mama gāṇḍivaṃ dhanur vinindatas te hṛdayaṃ na kampate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1059_0: eṣā karṇena parābhūtaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ nindantaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati dhanaṃjayasyoktiḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1059_1: yudhiṣṭhirakartṛkā gāṇḍivanindātra vibhāvaḥ / vadhecchānubhāvaḥ / na cāmarṣogratayor
GK16jgrasg1u:1059_2: nāsti bheda iti vācyam / prāg udāhṛte 'marṣadhvanāv ugratāyā apratīteḥ / nāpy asau
GK16jgrasg1u:1063: “akaruṇahṛdaya priyatama muñcāmi tvām itaḥ paraṃ nāham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1064: ity ālapati karāmbujam ādāyālījanasya vikalā sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1066_0: pravāsagataṃ svanāyikāvṛttāntaṃ pṛcchantaṃ nāyakaṃ prati kasyāścit saṃdeśahāriṇyā
GK16jgrasg1u:1066_1: uktiḥ / priyaviraho 'tra vibhāvaḥ / asaṃbaddhoktir anubhāvaḥ / unmādasya vyādhāv
GK16jgrasg1u:1066_2: antarbhāve saṃbhavaty api pṛthag upādānaṃ vyādhyantarāpekṣayā vaicitryaviśeṣasphoraṇāya /
GK16jgrasg1u:1068: na cātra prāṇaviyogātmakaṃ mukhyaṃ maraṇam ucitaṃ grahītum/ cittavṛttyātmakeṣu bhāveṣu tasyāprasakteḥ/ bhāveṣu ca sarveṣu kāryasahavartitayā śarīraprāṇasaṃyogasya hetutvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1071: adhunā khalu hanta sā kṛśāṅgī giram aṅgīkurute na bhāṣitāpi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1072_1: vākyavyaṅgyo 'py ayaṃ bhāvaḥ padavyaṅgyatām āvahati / etena bhāvasya padavyaṅgyatāyāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1073: dayitasya guṇān anusmarantīty anena vyajyamānaṃ “caramāvasthāyām api tasyā dayitaguṇavismaraṇaṃ nābhūd” iti vastu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1074: vipralambhasya śokasya vā caramam abhivyaktasya poṣakam/ ayaṃ ca bhāvaḥ svavyañjakavākyottaravartinā vākyāntareṇa saṃdarbhaghaṭakena nāyikādeḥ pratyujjīvanavarṇane vipralambhasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1075: anyathā tu karuṇasya poṣaka iti vivekaḥ/ kavayaḥ punar amuṃ prādhānyena na varṇayanti, amaṅgalaprāyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1078: “yadi sā mithilendranandinī nitarām eva na vidyate bhuvi/
GK16jgrasg1u:1079: atha me katham asti jīvitaṃ na vinālambanam āśritasthitiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1080: svātmani bhagavato rāmasyaiṣoktiḥ/ bhuvi sītāsti na veti saṃdeho 'tra vibhāvaḥ/ bhrūkṣepaśiroṅgulinartanam ākṣiptam anubhāvaḥ/ na cāsau cinteti śakyaṃ vaditum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1081: cintāyā niyamena niścayaṃ pratyaprayojakatvāt/ kiṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ādy ākārāyāś cintāyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1082: idam itthaṃ bhavitum arhati prāyaśa ityākārasya vitarkasya viṣayavailakṣaṇyopalambhāc ca/ na vinetyādinokto 'rthāntaranyāso 'py asminn evānukūlaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1086: duryodhanasya jīvita katham iva nādyāpi niryāsi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1088: tadākṣiptaṃ vadananamanādi cānubhāvaḥ/ asminn eva ca viṣādadhvanau duryodhanasyety arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyadhvanir anugrāhakaḥ/ na cātra trāsabhāvadhvanitvaṃ śakyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1090: yuddhvā mariṣyāmīti tasya vyavasāyāt/ nāpi dainyadhvanitvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1091: sakalasainyakṣaye 'pi vipadas tenāgaṇanāt/ na vā vīrarasadhvanitvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1095: ślathaya gatim ahaṃ no saṃgaraṃ draṣṭum īhe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1099: viṣādasyāpratīteḥ/ leśatayā pratitau vā trāsa evānuguṇyaucityena dhvanivyapadeśāyogyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1112: darpadurvilasito daśānanaḥ kutra yāmi nikaṭe kulakṣayaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1113: eṣā svātmani mandodaryā uktiḥ/ raghunandanāgamanam atra vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1114: kutra yāmīty etad vyaṅgyaḥ sthairyābhāvo 'nubhāvaḥ/ na cātra cintā prādhānyena vyajyata iti śakyate vaktum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1115: kutra yāmīti sphuṭaṃ pratītena sthairyābhāvenodvegasyeva cintāyā apratyāyanāt/ paraṃ tv āvegacarvaṇāyāṃ tatparipoṣakatayā guṇatvena cintāpi viṣayībhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1117: iyaṃ ca mohāt pūrvataḥ parataś ca jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1122: sā pūrvaṃ parato vā syān mohād iti vidāṃ matam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1124: “yad avadhi dayito vilocanābhyāṃ sahacari daivavaśena dūrato 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1125: tad avadhi śithilīkṛto madīyair atha karaṇaiḥ praṇayo nijakriyāsu//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1126: priyaviraho 'tra vibhāvaḥ/ karaṇaiś cakṣuḥśravaṇādibhiḥ kriyāsu tattatpramitiṣu praṇayasya śithilīkaraṇam anubhāvaḥ/ mohe cakṣurādibhiś cākṣuṣāder ajananam, iha
GK16jgrasg1u:1127: tu prakāraviśeṣavaiśiṣṭyena bāhulyenājananam iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ/ ata evodāharaṇe śithilīkṛta ity uktam, na tu tyakta iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1129: atra ca nāsāmarthyam/ nāpi kāryākāryavivekaśūnyatvam/ tena kāryākaraṇarūpasyānubhāvasya tulyatve 'pi glāner jaḍatāyāś cāsya bhedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1132: rajanīṃ priyeṇa dūrād upayātena vibodhitā kathābhiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1133: adhikaṃ na hi pārayāmi vaktuṃ sakhi mā jalpa tavāyasī rasajñā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1134_0: eṣā hi priyāgamanadvitīyadivase muhurniśāvṛttāntaṃ pṛcchantīṃ sakhīṃ prati rajanijāgaraṇajanitālasyāyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:1134_1: kasyāścid uktiḥ / atra rajanijāgaraṇaṃ vibhāvaḥ / adhikasaṃbhāṣaṇābhāvo 'nubhāvaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1134_2: jaḍatāyāṃ mohāt pūrvavartitvam uttaravartitvaṃ vā niyatam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1135_0: na tv atrety aparo viśeṣaḥ / gopanīyaviṣayatvād yadi kathābhir ity avivakṣitavācyaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1135_1: tadā śramo 'stu paripoṣakaḥ / śramajanye hy ālasye śramasya poṣakatāyā avāryatvāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:1135_2: atitṛptyādijanite tv ālasye śramād viviktaviṣayatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:1139: “kutra śaivaṃ dhanur idaṃ kva cāyaṃ prākṛtaḥ śiśuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1141_0: eṣā bhagnaharakārmukasya bhagavato rāmasya parākramam asahamānānāṃ tatratyānāṃ rājñām
GK16jgrasg1u:1141_1: uktiḥ / atra ca śrīmaddāśarathibalasya sarvotkṛṣṭatāyā darśanaṃ vibhāvaḥ / prākṛtaśiśupadagamyā nindā anubhāvaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1143: maunaṃ muñcati kiṃ ca kairavakule kāme dhanur dhunvati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1145: dhātaḥ kiṃ nu vidhau vidhātum ucito dhārādharāḍambaraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1147: kavigatā vidhātrālambanāsūyā vyajyata iti śakyate vaktum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1149_0: na viviktatayā pratiyate / nahi vidhātur aparādha iva bhagavato rāmasyāparādho 'sti
GK16jgrasg1u:1149_1: yena kaver iva vīrāṇām apy amarṣo 'bhivyajyeta / svabhāvo hi mahonnatakriyāniṣpādanaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1149_3: nāsty asūyādhvanitvam iti tu na vācyam / ekadhvaner dhvanyantarāvirodhitvāt / anyathā
GK16jgrasg1u:1150: teṣāṃ ca padadhvanibhiḥ saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kutrāpi na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1152: vyādhitvenāsya kathane 'pi viśeṣākāreṇa punaḥ kathanaṃ bībhatsabhayānakayor asyaiva vyādher aṅgatvaṃ nānyasyeti sphoraṇāya/ vipralambhe tu vyādhyantarasyāpi ca/ udāharaṇam--
GK16jgrasg1u:1159: iti yatra vibhāvāḥ syur anubhāvas tu bhartsanam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1165: ātmānaṃ hantum icchāmi yena tvam asi bhāvitaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1166_0: eṣā bhagavadanuraktivighaṭanopāyam apaśyataḥ prahlādaṃ prati hiraṇyakaśipor uktiḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1166_1: bhagavaddveṣotthāpitaḥ putradveṣo 'tra vibhāvaḥ / ātmavadhecchā paruṣavacanaṃ cānubhāvaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1166_2: na cāmarṣa evātra vyajyata iti vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:1167: sadaiva bhagavadanurāgiṇi prahlāde hiraṇyakaśipor amarṣasya cirakālasaṃbhṛtatvenātmavadhecchāyā idaṃprathamatānupapatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1168_1: eva capalatākhyacittavṛtteḥ siddheḥ / na cāmarṣaprakarṣa evātmavadhecchādikāraṇam
GK16jgrasg1u:1168_2: abhivyajyatām iti vācyam / prakarṣasyāpi svābhāvikavilakṣaṇalakṣaṇatāyā āvaśyakatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:1171: uttameṣu tv avajñādibhir janitā viṣayadveṣākhyā rodanadīrghaśvāsadīnamukhatādikāriṇī cittavṛttir nirvedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1173: “yadi lakṣmaṇa sā mṛgekṣaṇā na madīkṣāsaraṇiṃ sameṣyati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1174: amunā jaḍajīvitena me jagatā vā viphalena kiṃ phalam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1183: api tu bhagavadaiśvaryam avāṅmanasagocara iti cet tathāpi tādṛśabhagavadaiśvaryavarṇanānubhāvitayā kavigatabhagavadālambanaratyā dhvanitvam akṣatam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1185: “na dhanaṃ na ca rājyasaṃpadaṃ na hi vidyām idam ekam arthaye/
GK16jgrasg1u:1186: mayi dhehi manāg api prabho karuṇābhaṅgitaraṅgitāṃ dṛśam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1187: atra dhanādyapekṣāśūnyasya bhagavaddṛgantapātābhilāṣo hi bhagavaty atyantānuraktiṃ vyanakti/ evaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā bhāvāḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1188: atha katham asya saṃkhyāniyamaḥ/ mātsaryodvegadambherṣyāvivekanirṇayaklaibyakṣamākutukotkaṇṭhāvinayasaṃśayadhārṣṭyādīnām api tatra tatra lakṣyeṣu darśanāt iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1189: na/ ukteṣv evaiṣām antarbhāveṇa saṃkhyāntarānupapatteḥ/ asūyāto mātsaryasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1199_0: cāpalād dhārṣṭyasya ca vastutaḥ sūkṣme bhede 'pi nāntarīyakatayā tadanatiriktasyaivādhyavasāyāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:1199_1: munivacanānupālanasya saṃbhava ucchṛṅkhalatāyā anaucityāt / eṣu ca saṃcāribhāveṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:1199_2: madhye kecana keṣāṃcana vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:1201: tathā hi-- īrṣyāyā nirvedaṃ prati vibhāvatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1202: asūyāṃ prati cānubhāvatvam/ cintāyā nidrāṃ prati vibhāvatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1206_0: vibhāvādāv anaucityaṃ punar lokānāṃ vyavahārato vijñeyam / yatra teṣām ayuktam iti
GK16jgrasg1u:1206_1: dhīr iti kecid āhuḥ / tad apare na kṣamante / munipatnyādiviṣayakaratyādeḥ saṃgrahe
GK16jgrasg1u:1206_2: 'pi bahunāyakaviṣayāyā anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca rater asaṃgrahāt / tatra vibhāvagatasyānaucityasyābhāvāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:1206_3: tasmād anaucityena ratyādir viśeṣaṇīyaḥ / itthaṃ cānucitavibhāvālambanāyā bahunāyakaviṣayāyā
GK16jgrasg1u:1206_4: anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca saṃgraha iti / anaucityaṃ ca prāgvad eva / tatra rasādyābhāsatvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1206_5: rasatvādinā na samānādhikaraṇam / nirmalasyaiva rasāditvāt / “hetvābhāsatvam iva
GK16jgrasg1u:1207: api tu sadoṣatvād ābhāsavyavahāraḥ/ aśvābhāsādivyavahāravat” ity apare/
GK16jgrasg1u:1213: atrālambanam anucitapraṇayā rājaramaṇī/ rahorajanyādy uddīpanam/ sāhasena rājāntaḥpure gamanam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1215: niḥśvāsāśleṣādayaś cānubhāvāḥ/ śaṅkādayaḥ saṃcāriṇaḥ/ niṣiddhālambanakatvāc cāsyā rateḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1216: ābhāsatvaṃ rasasya/ na cātra cakitanayanām ity anena parapuruṣasparśatrāsābhivyaktyā rater anubhayaniṣṭhatety ābhāsatāhetur vācyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1217_0: asyāś ca cirāya tasminn āsaktāyā antaḥpure parapuruṣāgamanasyātyantam asaṃbhāvanayā
GK16jgrasg1u:1217_1: ka eṣa māṃ bodhayatīty ādāv ucita eva trāsaḥ / anantaraṃ ca paricayābhivyaktyā so
GK16jgrasg1u:1217_2: 'yaṃ matpriyo madarthaṃ prāṇān api tṛṇīkṛtyāgata iti jñānād utpannaṃ harṣam abhivyañjayat
GK16jgrasg1u:1217_3: smeravadanām iti viśeṣaṇaṃ ratiṃ tadīyām api vyanakti / paraṃ tu prādhānyaṃ nāyakaniṣṭhāyā eva rateḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1221: taruṇeṣu vilocanābjamālām atha bālā pathi pātayāṃbabhūva//
GK16jgrasg1u:1222_0: atra kutaś cid āgacchantyāḥ pathi tadīyarūpayauvanagṛhītamānasair yuvabhir anugamyamānāyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:1222_3: varṇanād abhivyajyamānā ratir bahuvacanena bahuviṣayā gamyata iti bhavaty ayam api rasābhāsaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1226: atra rater navavadhvā manāg apy asparśād anubhayaniṣṭhatvenābhāsatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1238_0: paramākulatayā paramasaundaryaprayojyaṃ nakulasahadevayor autsukyaṃ ca vyañjayantībhir
GK16jgrasg1u:1238_1: dṛgbhiḥ pāñcālyā bahuviṣayāyā rater abhivyañjanād rasābhāsa eveti navyāḥ / prāñcas
GK16jgrasg1u:1238_2: tv apariṇetṛbahunāyakaviṣayatve rater ābhāsatety āhuḥ / tatra śṛṅgārarasa iva śṛṅgārābhāso
GK16jgrasg1u:1238_3: 'pi dvividhaḥ / saṃyogavipralambhabhedāt / saṃyogābhāsas tv anupadam evodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1240: “vyatyastaṃ lapati kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇam atho maunaṃ samālambate
GK16jgrasg1u:1241: sarvasmin vidadhāti kiṃ ca viṣaye dṛṣṭi nirālambanām/
GK16jgrasg1u:1242: śvāsaṃ dīrgham urīkaroti na manāg aṅgeṣu dhatte dhṛtiṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1244: atra sītālambaneyaṃ laṅkeśagatā vipralambharatir anubhayaniṣṭhatayā jagadgurupatnīviṣayakatayā cābhāsatāṃ gatā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1245_0: vyatyastaṃ lapatīty ādibhir uktibhir vyajyamānair unmādaśramamohacintāvyādhibhis
GK16jgrasg1u:1245_1: tathaivābhāsatāṃ gataiḥ prādhānyena paripoṣyamāṇā dhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ / evaṃ kalahaśīlakuputrādyālambanatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:1251: yajñīyapaśuvasāsṛṅmāṃsādyālambanatayā varṇyamānā jugupsā ca rasābhāsāḥ/ vistṛtibhayāc cāmī nehodāhṛtāḥ sudhībhir unneyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1258_0: gurukule vidyābhyāsasamaye tadīyakanyālāvaṇyagṛhītamānasasyānyasya vā kasya cid apratiṣiddhagamanāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1258_1: smarato deśāntaraṃ gatasyeyam uktiḥ / atra ca svātmatyāgātyāgābhyāṃ srakcandanādiṣu viṣayeṣu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1260_0: asyāṃ ca lokottaratvam abhivyajyamānaṃ vyatirekavapuḥsmṛtim eva puṣṇātīti saiva pradhānam /
GK16jgrasg1u:1260_1: evaṃ ca tyāgābhāvagataṃ sārvadikatvaṃ vyañjayanty adhidevatopamāpi / eṣā cānucitaviṣayakatvād
GK16jgrasg1u:1260_2: anubhayaniṣṭhatvāc ca bhāvābhāsaḥ / yadi punar iyaṃ tatpariṇetur evoktis tadā bhāvadhvanir eva //
GK16jgrasg1u:1263: sa cotpattyavacchinna eva grāhyaḥ, tasyaiva sahṛdayacamatkāritvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1268: tadabhivyaktaḥ prasādo vānubhāvaḥ/ utpattikālāvacchinno roṣanāśo vyaṅgyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1274: atrāpi dayitavakṣogatavipakṣakāminīhāralakṣmadarśanaṃ vibhāvaḥ/ priyāṃsadeśavalayīkṛtanijabāhulatākarṣaṇam anubhāvaḥ/ roṣodayo vyaṅgyaḥ/ yady āpi bhāvaśāntau bhāvāntarodayasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1275: bhāvodaye vā pūrvaṃ bhāvaśānter āvaśyakatvān nānayor vivikto vyavahārasya viṣayaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1285: tādṛśasyaiva śīlaśauryādeś ca darśanaṃ vibhāvaḥ/ nayanagatasaṃkocavikāsāv anubhāvaḥ/ vrīḍautsukyayoḥ saṃdhir vyaṅgyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1288: bhāvānāṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvam āpannānām udāsīnānāṃ vā vyāmiśraṇam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1291: “pāpaṃ hanta mayā hatena vihitaṃ kītāpi yady āpitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1292: sā mām indumukhī vinā bata vane kiṃ jīvitaṃ dhāsyati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1293: ālokeya kathaṃ mukhāni kṛtināṃ kiṃ te vadiṣyanti māṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1294: rājyaṃ yātu rasātalaṃ punar idaṃ na prāṇituṃ kāmaye//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1295_1: śabalatā / yat tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkākāraiḥ “uttarottareṇa bhāvena pūrvapūrvabhāvopamardaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:1296_0: tan na / “paśyet kaścic cala capala re kā tvarāhaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā
GK16jgrasg1u:1296_1: vyutkramaḥ kvāsi yāsi” ity atra śaṅkāsūyādhṛtismṛtiśramadainyamatyautsukyānām upamardaleśaśūnyatve
GK16jgrasg1u:1296_2: 'pi śabalatāyā rājastutiguṇatvena pañcamollāse mūlakṛtaiva nirūpaṇāt / svottaraviśeṣaguṇena
GK16jgrasg1u:1296_3: jāyamānas tu nāśo na vyaṅgyaḥ / na vopamardapadavācyaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1300_0: atredaṃ bodhyam-- ya ete bhāvaśāntyudayasaṃdhiśabalatādhvanaya udāhṛtās te 'pi bhāvadhvanaya
GK16jgrasg1u:1301: camatkṛtes tatraiva viśrānteḥ/ yady apy utpattivināśasaṃdhiśabalatānāṃ tatsaṃbandhināṃ bhāvānāṃ ca
GK16jgrasg1u:1302: samānāyāṃ carvaṇāviṣayatāyāṃ na prādhānyaṃ vinigantuṃ śakyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1304: bhāvaśāntyādiṣv api teṣv eva śāntipratiyogitvādibhir vyajyamāneṣu tasyāḥ kalpayitum aucityāt/ kiṃ ca yadi bhāvaśāntyādau bhāvo na pradhānam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1305: kiṃ tu tadupasarjanakaśāntyādir evety abhyupeyate tadā vyajyamānabhāveṣv abhihitatatpraśamādiṣu kāvyeṣu bhāvapraśamādidhvanitvaṃ na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1310: udayasya vācyatve 'pi bhāvasyāvācyatvād dhanitvaṃ sustham iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1311_1: vācyatve 'py utpattyavacchinnasyāmarṣasya pradhānasyāvācyatvād yukta eva bhāvodayadhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1311_2: evaṃ vyajyamānabhāvapratiyogikasya praśamasya vācyatve bhāvaśāntidhvanitvaṃ na syāt / yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:1314: nanu śabdavācyānāṃ praśamādīnām aruṇakāntyaivānvayāt aruṇakāntipraśamāder eva vācyatvaṃ paryavasitam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1316: vyaṅgyavyañjakabhedasyāvaśyakatvāt/ na cāruṇyavyaṅgyaroṣasyaiva vācyībhūtapraśamādyanvaya iti vācyam/ vācyavyaṅgyapratītyor ānupūrvyeṇa siddhatayā vācyānvayabodhavelāyāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1317: vācyaiḥ saha vyaṅgyānvayānupapatteḥ/ anyathā “sudṛśo nayanābjakoṇayoḥ” ity asyānvayo na syāt/ maivam/ evam api--
GK16jgrasg1u:1318: “nirvāsayantīṃ dhṛtim aṅganānāṃ śobhāṃ harer eṇadṛśo dhayantyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1321: bhāvasya vācyatve 'pi pradhānasya tatpraśamasya vyaṅgyatvāt/ ubhayor apy avācyatvam apekṣitam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1322_1: iṣṭāpattis tu sahṛdayānām anucitaiva / tasmād bhāvapraśamādiṣv api prādhānyena bhāvānām eva camatkāritvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1323_0: praśamādes tūpasarjanatvam ato na tasya vācyatādoṣaḥ / idaṃ punar bhāvadhvanibhyo
GK16jgrasg1u:1323_1: bhāvaśāntyādidhvanīnāṃ camatkāravailakṣaṇye nidānam-- yad ekatra carvaṇāyāṃ bhāveṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:1324: amarṣāditvam eva vā prakāraḥ/ anyatra tu praśamāvasthatvādir apīti/ rasasya tu sthāyimūlakatvāt praśamāder asaṃbhavaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1327_0: so 'yaṃ nigaditaḥ sarvo 'pi ratyādilakṣaṇo vyaṅgyaprapañcaḥ sphuṭe prakaraṇe jhagiti
GK16jgrasg1u:1327_1: pratiteṣu vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṣu sahṛdayatamena pramātrā sūkṣmeṇaiva samayeta
GK16jgrasg1u:1327_2: pratīyata iti hetuhetumatoḥ paurvāparyakramasyālakṣaṇād alakṣyakramo vyapadiśyate /
GK16jgrasg1u:1328_0: unneyā vā vibhāvādayas tatra sāmagrīvilambādhīnaṃ camatkṛter māntharyam iti saṃlakṣyakramo
GK16jgrasg1u:1328_1: 'py eṣa bhavati / yathā-- “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ” iti prāg udāhṛte padye “saṃprati”
GK16jgrasg1u:1328_2: ity etadarthāvagatir vilambena / na khalu dharmigrāhakamānasiddhaṃ ratyādidhvaner
GK16jgrasg1u:1332_2: iti prāhur ānandavardhanācāryāḥ / rasabhāvādir artho dhvanyamāna eva,
GK16jgrasg1u:1333: na vācyaḥ/ tathāpi na sarvo 'lakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ” iti cābhinavaguptapādācāryāḥ/ syād etat,
GK16jgrasg1u:1334: yady ayaṃ rasādiḥ saṃlakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ syāt/ anuraṇanabhedagaṇanaprastāve “arthaśaktimūlasya dvādaśabhedāḥ” ity abhinavaguptoktiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1335: “tenāyaṃ dvādaśātmakaḥ” iti mammaṭoktiś ca na saṃgaccheta,
GK16jgrasg1u:1336_1: tribhir upādhibhis traividhyam āpannena ṣaḍātmanā vastvalaṃkārayor iva rasāder apy
GK16jgrasg1u:1337: atrocyate-- prakaṭair vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhir alakṣyakramatayaiva vyajyamāno ratyādiḥ sthāyibhāvo rasībhavati,
GK16jgrasg1u:1338: na saṃlakṣyakramatayā/ rasībhāvo hi nāma jhagiti jāyamānālaukikacamatkāraviṣayasthāyitvam/ saṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyamānasya ratyādes tu vastumātrataiva,
GK16jgrasg1u:1339: na rasāditvam iti teṣām āśayasya varṇanena na taduktīnāṃ virodhaḥ/ upapattis tv arthe 'smin vicāraṇīyā/ rasabhāvādir artha ity atra rasādiśabdo ratyādiparaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1340_1: padaikadeśair avarṇātmakai rāgādibhiś cābhivyaktim āmananti / tatra vākyagatānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1340_2: padānāṃ sarveṣām api svārthopasthitidvārā vākyārthajñānopāyatve samāne 'pi kurvadrūpatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:1340_4: ākṣipati” ity atra mandam ity asya / racanāvarṇānāṃ tu padavākyāntargatatvena vyañjakatāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭatvam
GK16jgrasg1u:1340_5: eva na tu vyañjakatvam iti yady api suvacam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1342: racanāviśiṣṭapadavākyatvena vā vyañjakatvam iti vinigamanāviraheṇa ghaṭādau daṇḍacakrādeḥ kāraṇatvasyeva pratyekam eva vyañjakatāyāḥ siddhir iti prāñcaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1344: gauravān mānābhāvāc ca/ na hi guṇyabhivyañjanaṃ vinā guṇābhivyañjakatvaṃ nāstīty asti niyamaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1345_0: indriyatraye vyabhicārāt / itthaṃ ca svasvavyañjakopanītānāṃ guṇināṃ guṇānām udāsīnānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1345_1: ca yathā parasparopaśleṣeṇaudāsīnyena vā tattatpramitigocaratā tathā rasānāṃ tadguṇānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1345_2: cābhivyāktiviṣayateti tu navyāḥ / udāharaṇaṃ tu “tāṃ tamāla” ityādi prāg uktam eva
GK16jgrasg1u:1345_3: vākyasya vyañjakatāyām api “āvirbhūtā yad avadhi” ityādi ca / prabandhasya tu yogavāsiṣṭharāmāyaṇe śāntakaruṇayoḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1346_0: ratnāvalyādīni ca śṛṅgārasya vyañjakatvān nidarśanāni prasiddhāni / mannirmitāś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:1346_1: pañja laharyo bhāvasya / padaikadeśasya ca “nikhilam idaṃ jagad aṇḍakaṃ vahāmi” iti
GK16jgrasg1u:1346_2: karūpataddhito vīrarasasya prāg evodāhṛtaḥ / evaṃ rāgādibhir api vyaṅgyatve sahṛdayahṛdayam
GK16jgrasg1u:1346_3: eva pramāṇam / evam eṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ prādhānyena nirūpitāny udāharaṇāni / guṇībhāve tu vakṣyante,
GK16jgrasg1u:1347: nāmāni ca/ tatra prādhānya evaiṣāṃ rasāditvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1348: anyathā tu ratyāditvam eva/ nāmani rasapadaṃ tu ratyādiparam ity eke/ asty eva rasāditvaṃ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1349: kiṃ tu na dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam ity apare//
